0-1-2.name: Elixir of Midnight Flight
0-1-2.description: A shimmering silver potion that grants the drinker the ability to glide through moonbeams. The Dragon Scale amplifies the power of the Moonflower, while Raven Feather guides the soul through darkness.

0-1-3.name: Brew of Celestial Binding
0-1-3.description: This luminous mixture weaves together the strength of dragons with the delicate threads of spider silk, all under the watchful gaze of the moon. It binds promises that cannot be broken.

0-1-4.name: Draught of Ancient Awakening
0-1-4.description: Dragon fire meets earth's screaming root beneath the moon's pale light. This potion awakens dormant powers buried deep within the drinker's bloodline.

0-1-5.name: Philtre of Draconic Nightshade
0-1-5.description: A dangerously beautiful concoction that combines the moon's blessing with dragon's might and deadly nightshade. Grants visions of futures both glorious and terrible.

0-1-6.name: Tonic of Scaled Tongues
0-1-6.description: This peculiar brew allows the drinker to speak with reptiles and amphibians. Moonflower opens the mind, Dragon Scale provides kinship, and Toad Tongue translates the words.

0-1-7.name: Essence of Twilight Hunters
0-1-7.description: A potion for those who stalk the boundary between day and night. Dragon Scale grants courage, Bat Wing offers echolocation, and Moonflower illuminates the hidden paths.

0-1-8.name: Concoction of Lunar Dragons
0-1-8.description: Legends speak of dragons who nested in moon craters. This brew captures their essence through Dragon Scale and Moonflower, protected by Witch Hazel's ancient wards.

0-1-9.name: Infusion of Beautiful Destruction
0-1-9.description: Moonflower's gentle light cannot fully mask the deadly combination of Dragon Scale's fire and Belladonna's kiss. Beauty and danger intertwined in liquid form.

0-1-10.name: Draft of the Scaled Garden
0-1-10.description: A potion that causes flowers to bloom even in dragonfire's wake. Moonflower provides growth, Dragon Scale brings heat, and Foxglove guards the threshold between.

0-1-11.name: Elixir of Moon-Scorched Earth
0-1-11.description: Dragon Scale and Wolfsbane create a potent ward against lycanthropy, while Moonflower paradoxically strengthens the cure. A hunter's most trusted companion.

0-1-12.name: Potion of the Dragon's Eye
0-1-12.description: This shimmering brew grants the ability to see magic itself. Dragon Scale provides the draconic sight, Eye of Newt focuses the vision, and Moonflower reveals what is hidden.

0-1-13.name: Brew of Nine Scales
0-1-13.description: Black Cat Whisker brings luck to this powerful mixture of Moonflower and Dragon Scale. Said to grant the drinker nine chances to escape death.

0-1-14.name: Draught of the Barrow Dragon
0-1-14.description: Ancient dragons were sometimes buried with moon rituals. This potion connects to those old spirits through Graveyard Moss, Dragon Scale, and Moonflower's light.

0-1-15.name: Tonic of Wyrmwood
0-1-15.description: Wormwood's bitterness tempers the fierce power of Dragon Scale, while Moonflower ensures the drinker maintains their sanity when touching draconic power.

0-1-16.name: Essence of Prophetic Dragons
0-1-16.description: Dragons were said to dream the future. This brew combines Dragon Scale with Mugwort's visionary properties and Moonflower's revealing light to grant prophetic dreams.

0-1-17.name: Philtre of Elder Wyrms
0-1-17.description: The eldest dragons witnessed the planting of the first Elder trees. This ancient recipe combines their essences with Moonflower to grant wisdom spanning ages.

0-1-18.name: Concoction of Bleeding Scales
0-1-18.description: A warrior's potion that combines the pain of the Blood Rose Thorn, the resilience of Dragon Scale, and the healing light of Moonflower. For those who fight on despite injury.

0-1-19.name: Infusion of Cosmic Dragons
0-1-19.description: Some dragons fly between worlds, leaving trails of stardust. This extraordinary brew captures that cosmic journey through Dragon Scale, Stardust, and Moonflower's guidance.

0-2-3.name: Draft of the Shadow Weaver
0-2-3.description: Raven's darkness, Spider's patience, and Moonflower's light create a potion for those who work in secrets. Allows the weaving of illusions and glamours.

0-2-4.name: Elixir of Root and Feather
0-2-4.description: A grounding yet liberating brew. Mandrake Root anchors to earth, Raven Feather grants flight, and Moonflower shows the path between soil and sky.

0-2-5.name: Potion of the Corvid's Poison
0-2-5.description: Ravens are carrion birds immune to many toxins. This dark brew combines their essence through Raven Feather with Nightshade's poison, blessed by Moonflower for protection.

0-2-6.name: Brew of Croaking Ravens
0-2-6.description: An unusual mixture that grants the ability to speak with all creatures that croak, caw, or call. Toad Tongue translates, Raven Feather empowers, and Moonflower opens communication.

0-2-7.name: Tonic of Night's Wings
0-2-7.description: Both bat and raven take flight in darkness. Combined with Moonflower's light, this potion grants silent movement and the ability to navigate by sound and shadow.

0-2-8.name: Essence of the Witch's Familiar
0-2-8.description: Many witches bond with ravens as familiars. This traditional brew combines Raven Feather, Witch Hazel for the bond, and Moonflower to seal the connection.

0-2-9.name: Draught of the Black Garden
0-2-9.description: A gothic mixture where Belladonna's deadly beauty meets Raven Feather's darkness, all illuminated by Moonflower. For those who find beauty in shadow.

0-2-10.name: Philtre of Feathered Bells
0-2-10.description: Foxglove bells ring silent warnings while Raven Feather carries messages across distances. Moonflower ensures the words arrive true and unaltered.

0-2-11.name: Concoction of the Moon Wolf
0-2-11.description: Ravens and wolves often share kills under the full moon. This potion creates kinship with both predators through Raven Feather, Wolfsbane, and Moonflower's blessing.

0-2-12.name: Infusion of the All-Seeing
0-2-12.description: Ravens see from above, newts from below, and Moonflower reveals all between. This potion grants perspective from every angle and the wisdom to understand it.

0-2-13.name: Elixir of Omen and Fortune
0-2-13.description: Both ravens and black cats are creatures of superstition. Combined with Moonflower, this brew allows the drinker to sense approaching fortune or doom.

0-2-14.name: Brew of the Carrion Moon
0-2-14.description: Ravens feast in graveyards under moonlight. This necromantic mixture uses Graveyard Moss, Raven Feather, and Moonflower to communicate with the recently deceased.

0-2-15.name: Draft of Bitter Flight
0-2-15.description: Wormwood's bitterness carries the drinker's spirit on raven wings through the dreamscape. Moonflower ensures they return safely to their body.

0-2-16.name: Tonic of Prophetic Caws
0-2-16.description: Ravens can predict death and disaster. This potion enhances that gift through Raven Feather and Mugwort's visions, revealed clearly by Moonflower's light.

0-2-17.name: Essence of the Elder's Messenger
0-2-17.description: In old tales, ravens carried messages to the Elder tree at the world's center. This brew recreates that mythic connection through Elderflower, Raven Feather, and Moonflower.

0-2-18.name: Potion of Thorned Wings
0-2-18.description: A warrior-poet's brew combining the pain of Blood Rose Thorn, the freedom of Raven Feather, and the hope of Moonflower. For those who fight for beauty.

0-2-19.name: Philtre of Stellar Navigation
0-2-19.description: Ravens migrate by starlight, and this potion captures their gift. Stardust maps the heavens, Raven Feather grants direction, and Moonflower lights the way home.

0-3-4.name: Concoction of Bound Roots
0-3-4.description: Spider Silk winds around Mandrake Root beneath Moonflower's gaze. This potion creates unbreakable bindings, whether of promise, spell, or fate itself.

0-3-5.name: Infusion of the Widow's Web
0-3-5.description: A deadly trap disguised as beautiful dew-kissed silk. Nightshade's poison, Spider Silk's snare, and Moonflower's deceptive innocence combine for perfect ambush.

0-3-6.name: Elixir of Sticky Tongues
0-3-6.description: This peculiar brew grants the ability to catch lies as easily as a toad catches flies. Spider Silk snares falsehoods, Toad Tongue tastes truth, and Moonflower reveals all.

0-3-7.name: Brew of the Cave Dwellers
0-3-7.description: Both spiders and bats thrive in darkness. This potion grants comfort in enclosed spaces and the ability to sense vibrations. Moonflower provides just enough light to navigate.

0-3-8.name: Draught of Web and Ward
0-3-8.description: A powerful protection spell in liquid form. Spider Silk catches harm, Witch Hazel deflects curses, and Moonflower seals the barrier with lunar blessing.

0-3-9.name: Tonic of Beautiful Entrapment
0-3-9.description: Belladonna lures victims while Spider Silk holds them fast. Moonflower adds an eerie beauty to this dangerous brew favored by those who hunt the wicked.

0-3-10.name: Essence of Morning Dew
0-3-10.description: Foxglove bells collect morning dew like spider webs under moonlight. This gentle potion promotes healing and clarity, washing away confusion and toxins.

0-3-11.name: Philtre of the Hunter's Trap
0-3-11.description: Wolf hunters know to set snares with spider-silk triggers. This brew combines that cunning through Spider Silk and Wolfsbane, revealed by Moonflower when prey approaches.

0-3-12.name: Concoction of Eight Eyes
0-3-12.description: Spiders and newts both watch the world through many-lensed eyes. Combined with Moonflower's revealing light, this potion grants perception of hidden magical patterns.

0-3-13.name: Infusion of Lucky Threads
0-3-13.description: Black Cat Whisker brings fortune to those caught in Spider Silk's web. Moonflower ensures the luck is genuine and not merely chance. A gambler's secret weapon.

0-3-14.name: Draft of Grave Silk
0-3-14.description: Ancient tombs are draped in spider webs and moss. This necromantic brew uses Spider Silk, Graveyard Moss, and Moonflower to weave connections to ancestral spirits.

0-3-15.name: Elixir of the Tangled Mind
0-3-15.description: Wormwood confuses while Spider Silk tangles thoughts into knots. Moonflower provides the only thread leading out of this labyrinth. A potion for interrogation or meditation.

0-3-16.name: Potion of Dream Weaving
0-3-16.description: Spider Silk weaves dreams into tapestries while Mugwort grants visions and Moonflower illuminates their meaning. For lucid dreamers and prophets.

0-3-17.name: Brew of the Elder Web
0-3-17.description: The oldest spiders spin webs in elder trees. This ancient recipe combines Spider Silk, Elderflower, and Moonflower to reveal connections between all living things.

0-3-18.name: Tonic of Silken Thorns
0-3-18.description: Spider silk is soft yet stronger than steel, like roses that bear thorns. This potion combines gentle appearance with hidden strength through Spider Silk, Blood Rose Thorn, and Moonflower.

0-3-19.name: Essence of Cosmic Weaving
0-3-19.description: They say spider webs map the stars. This extraordinary brew combines Spider Silk's patterns with Stardust's cosmic energy, all revealed by Moonflower's light.

0-4-5.name: Draught of Screaming Shadows
0-4-5.description: Mandrake Root's shriek meets Nightshade's deadly whisper under Moonflower's witness. This terrifying brew strips away illusions and forces truth into the light.

0-4-6.name: Philtre of Earth's Tongue
0-4-6.description: Mandrake Root connects to deep earth, Toad Tongue speaks old languages, and Moonflower translates both into understanding. Grants communion with the soil itself.

0-4-7.name: Concoction of Underground Flight
0-4-7.description: A paradoxical brew for navigating cave systems. Mandrake Root knows every tunnel, Bat Wing provides echolocation, and Moonflower gives dim but sufficient light.

0-4-8.name: Infusion of the Rooted Witch
0-4-8.description: A traditional brew for hedge witches who never leave their gardens. Mandrake Root anchors, Witch Hazel protects, and Moonflower ensures their magic reaches far despite staying near.

0-4-9.name: Elixir of the Poisoned Root
0-4-9.description: Where Mandrake screams, Belladonna smiles its deadly smile. Combined with Moonflower's reveal, this potion shows the truth hidden in beautiful lies and fair words.

0-4-10.name: Brew of the Witch's Garden
0-4-10.description: Every proper witch's garden contains Mandrake, Foxglove, and Moonflower. This traditional brew grants mastery over all growing things and deep connection to the land.

0-4-11.name: Draft of the Howling Root
0-4-11.description: Mandrake's scream and Wolfsbane's howl create a cacophony that drives away evil spirits. Moonflower adds power to this potent warding brew.

0-4-12.name: Tonic of Earth and Water
0-4-12.description: Mandrake lives in soil, newts in ponds, yet both thrive in moonlit gardens. This potion grants adaptability and the ability to find nourishment in unlikely places.

0-4-13.name: Essence of the Ninth Root
0-4-13.description: Dig up mandrake under a full moon while a black cat watches, so the old tales say. This brew combines all three elements for powerful earth magic and good fortune.

0-4-14.name: Potion of the Buried Moon
0-4-14.description: Mandrake grows near graves, Graveyard Moss covers them, and Moonflower blooms above. This necromantic mixture allows the living to walk safely among the dead.

0-4-15.name: Philtre of Bitter Roots
0-4-15.description: Both Mandrake and Wormwood are bitter as truth itself. Combined with Moonflower's revealing light, this potion forces the drinker to face harsh realities they've avoided.

0-4-16.name: Concoction of Dreaming Earth
0-4-16.description: Mandrake Root dreams beneath the soil, Mugwort grants vision, and Moonflower reveals what the earth itself remembers. For those seeking ancient knowledge.

0-4-17.name: Infusion of the Elder Root
0-4-17.description: Elder trees and Mandrake both guard thresholds between worlds. Combined with Moonflower, this potion grants safe passage through dangerous liminal spaces.

0-4-18.name: Elixir of Thorned Ground
0-4-18.description: Where Blood Rose grows, Mandrake thrives on spilled vitality. Moonflower sanctifies this connection between pain, growth, and transformation.

0-4-19.name: Brew of Starroots
0-4-19.description: They say Mandrake first grew where stars fell to earth. This potion combines that myth through Mandrake Root, Stardust, and Moonflower, connecting heaven and earth.

0-5-6.name: Draft of the Poisoned Tongue
0-5-6.description: Nightshade on Toad Tongue under Moonflower's gaze creates a potion for those who deal in dangerous words and deadly truths. Speak carefully after drinking this.

0-5-7.name: Tonic of Twilight Hunters
0-5-7.description: Bats hunt insects poisoned by nightshade. This brew grants immunity to toxins and the ability to sense poison before it touches your lips. Moonflower seals the protection.

0-5-8.name: Essence of the Dark Hedge
0-5-8.description: Witch Hazel and Nightshade grow in the shadowed places where Moonflower rarely blooms. This potion grants power over shadow and the ability to hide in plain sight.

0-5-9.name: Potion of the Sisters Three
0-5-9.description: Nightshade, Belladonna, and Moonflower—the deadly sisters of the witching garden. This supremely dangerous brew grants visions of death, including the drinker's own.

0-5-10.name: Philtre of the Poisoned Garden
0-5-10.description: Nightshade and Foxglove are beautiful killers that bloom under moonlight. This potion teaches that beauty and danger are often inseparable, and wisdom lies in respecting both.

0-5-11.name: Concoction of the Moon's Shadow
0-5-11.description: Wolfsbane and Nightshade both thrive in the moon's dark phase. This potent brew offers protection against lycanthropy and all manner of shapeshifters.

0-5-12.name: Infusion of Poisoned Sight
0-5-12.description: Nightshade dilates pupils while Eye of Newt sharpens vision. Under Moonflower's light, this dangerous brew allows sight of spirits and the ability to see in absolute darkness.

0-5-13.name: Elixir of Nine Deaths
0-5-13.description: Black Cat's nine lives meet Nightshade's fatal kiss under Moonflower's watch. This brew grants the drinker a single chance to survive an otherwise fatal poison.

0-5-14.name: Brew of the Deadly Moss
0-5-14.description: In graveyards, Nightshade grows through moss-covered stones. Combined with Moonflower, this necromantic potion allows the drinker to sense how each nearby person will die.

0-5-15.name: Draft of Double Bitterness
0-5-15.description: Wormwood and Nightshade combine their bitterness and danger. Moonflower provides the only sweetness in this harsh brew that purges both body and spirit of weakness.

0-5-16.name: Tonic of Nightmares
0-5-16.description: Mugwort brings dreams while Nightshade makes them terrible. Moonflower tries but fails to soften this brew that forces the drinker to face their deepest fears.

0-5-17.name: Essence of the Dark Passage
0-5-17.description: Elderflower marks thresholds while Nightshade guards them. Under Moonflower's light, this potion allows passage through death's door and return—once.

0-5-18.name: Potion of Bleeding Shadows
0-5-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn's pain combines with Nightshade's numbness under Moonflower's witness. For those who must do dark work and wish to feel neither the doing nor the guilt.

0-5-19.name: Philtre of Dying Stars
0-5-19.description: Nightshade blooms as stars fade at dawn. This cosmic brew combines that transition through Nightshade, Stardust, and Moonflower, marking endings that birth beginnings.

0-6-7.name: Concoction of Night Croakers
0-6-7.description: Toads and bats both sing at twilight. This potion grants perfect pitch and the ability to navigate by sound alone. Moonflower adds the gift of hearing unspoken intentions.

0-6-8.name: Infusion of the Witch's Toad
0-6-8.description: Many witches keep toads as familiars. This brew combines Toad Tongue for communication, Witch Hazel for bonding, and Moonflower to seal the familiar contract.

0-6-9.name: Elixir of the Toad's Kiss
0-6-9.description: In fairy tales, a toad's kiss breaks curses. This potion uses Toad Tongue, Belladonna's beauty, and Moonflower's magic to transform ugliness into grace and curses into blessings.

0-6-10.name: Brew of the Pond Garden
0-6-10.description: Where water meets earth, toads sing among foxgloves under moonlight. This harmonious brew brings balance to body and spirit, healing rifts between opposing natures.

0-6-11.name: Draft of the Moon Toad
0-6-11.description: Old stories tell of toads that swallow the moon. This brew combines Toad Tongue with Wolfsbane's lunar connection and Moonflower itself, granting control over tides and cycles.

0-6-12.name: Tonic of Amphibian Vision
0-6-12.description: Toads and newts see differently than warm-blooded creatures. This potion grants their perspective through Toad Tongue and Eye of Newt, clarified by Moonflower's light.

0-6-13.name: Essence of Lucky Croaks
0-6-13.description: A toad crossing your path is lucky, as is a black cat's friendship. This whimsical brew combines both fortunes through Toad Tongue, Black Cat Whisker, and Moonflower's blessing.

0-6-14.name: Potion of the Grave Toad
0-6-14.description: Toads live in cemetery walls where Graveyard Moss grows thick. This necromantic brew uses Toad Tongue, moss, and Moonflower to hear the whispers of buried secrets.

0-6-15.name: Philtre of the Bitter Pond
0-6-15.description: Wormwood makes pond water bitter where toads still thrive. This hardy brew grants resilience and the ability to find sustenance even in toxic environments. Moonflower prevents lasting harm.

0-6-16.name: Concoction of Croaking Prophets
0-6-16.description: Toads were once used in divination. This brew combines Toad Tongue with Mugwort's visions and Moonflower's clarity to grant prophetic understanding of natural patterns and coming weather.

0-6-17.name: Infusion of the Elder Toad
0-6-17.description: The oldest toads live beneath elder trees. This wise brew combines Toad Tongue, Elderflower, and Moonflower to grant patience, perspective, and the wisdom of slow living.

0-6-18.name: Elixir of Thorned Warts
0-6-18.description: A humorous yet powerful brew combining the roughness of Toad Tongue and Blood Rose Thorn with Moonflower's smoothing grace. Teaches that strength comes from embracing imperfection.

0-6-19.name: Brew of Cosmic Croaking
0-6-19.description: Ancient peoples believed toad songs called down stars. This mystical potion combines Toad Tongue, Stardust, and Moonflower to create harmony between earth's song and heaven's silence.

0-7-8.name: Draft of the Night Watch
0-7-8.description: Bats patrol the night while witches work. This protective brew combines Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Moonflower to create wards that alert the caster to approaching danger.

0-7-9.name: Tonic of Beautiful Night
0-7-9.description: Belladonna's name means 'beautiful lady,' and bats are the ladies of the night sky. Combined with Moonflower, this potion grants grace and beauty that intensifies after sunset.

0-7-10.name: Essence of Twilight Bells
0-7-10.description: As foxglove bells ring silently in twilight, bats emerge to hunt. This potion grants acute hearing and the ability to sense vibrations through air and ground. Moonflower attunes the senses.

0-7-11.name: Potion of Moon Hunters
0-7-11.description: Bats and wolves both hunt under the moon's light. This brew combines their predatory gifts through Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Moonflower, sharpening all senses to supernatural levels.

0-7-12.name: Philtre of Double Sight
0-7-12.description: Bats see by sound while newts see by light. This paradoxical brew grants both forms of vision through Bat Wing, Eye of Newt, and Moonflower's illumination.

0-7-13.name: Concoction of Night's Fortune
0-7-13.description: Both bats and black cats are creatures of superstition and night. This brew combines Bat Wing, Black Cat Whisker, and Moonflower to grant luck in darkness and during risky ventures.

0-7-14.name: Infusion of the Crypt Bat
0-7-14.description: Bats roost in mausoleums where Graveyard Moss thrives. This dark brew uses Bat Wing, moss, and Moonflower to grant comfort in death's presence and immunity to grave curses.

0-7-15.name: Elixir of Bitter Flight
0-7-15.description: Wormwood's bitterness cannot ground the bat's soaring spirit. This paradoxical brew combines Bat Wing, Wormwood, and Moonflower to grant mental flight even when physically confined.

0-7-16.name: Brew of Shadow Dreams
0-7-16.description: Bats sleep by day and dream strange dreams. This potion combines Bat Wing with Mugwort's visions and Moonflower's light to grant dreams of flight and freedom.

0-7-17.name: Draft of Elder Wings
0-7-17.description: The oldest bats nest in hollow elder trees. This ancient recipe combines Bat Wing, Elderflower, and Moonflower to grant longevity and the wisdom that comes from observing centuries.

0-7-18.name: Tonic of Bleeding Flight
0-7-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn's pain cannot stop the bat's determined flight. This warrior's brew combines pain tolerance with persistent courage through Bat Wing, Blood Rose Thorn, and Moonflower's healing.

0-7-19.name: Essence of Stellar Wings
0-7-19.description: Some say bats navigate by starlight. This cosmic brew combines Bat Wing's echolocation with Stardust's celestial guidance and Moonflower's illumination for perfect navigation.

0-8-9.name: Potion of the Dark Sisters
0-8-9.description: Witch Hazel and Belladonna are two faces of feminine power—protection and danger. Combined with Moonflower, this brew grants women the strength to embody both as needed.

0-8-10.name: Philtre of the Witch's Heart
0-8-10.description: Every witch's garden contains Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Moonflower. This traditional heart-brew brings emotional balance, opens blocked heart chakras, and heals romantic wounds.

0-8-11.name: Concoction of the Moon Wolf Guard
0-8-11.description: Witch Hazel's protection meets Wolfsbane's power under Moonflower's blessing. This potent ward specifically protects against lycanthropes while allowing safe passage for natural wolves.

0-8-12.name: Infusion of the Witch's Eye
0-8-12.description: Witch Hazel opens magical sight while Eye of Newt focuses it. Moonflower reveals what was hidden. A brew for those learning to see through glamours and deceptions.

0-8-13.name: Elixir of the Familiar Bond
0-8-13.description: Black Cat Whisker and Witch Hazel create the traditional binding for witch and familiar. Moonflower sanctifies this sacred partnership that can last lifetimes.

0-8-14.name: Brew of the Guardian Moss
0-8-14.description: Witch Hazel and Graveyard Moss combine to protect sacred burial grounds. Moonflower ensures the dead rest peacefully while the living are gently warned away.

0-8-15.name: Draft of Cleansing Bitterness
0-8-15.description: Witch Hazel purifies while Wormwood purges. Moonflower soothes the harshness of this powerful cleansing brew that removes curses, hexes, and spiritual parasites.

0-8-16.name: Tonic of Prophetic Protection
0-8-16.description: Witch Hazel shields the seer while Mugwort grants visions. Moonflower ensures prophecies arrive clearly without overwhelming the prophet with their weight.

0-8-17.name: Essence of the Elder Witch
0-8-17.description: The wisest witches work with Elderflower and Witch Hazel under Moonflower's light. This brew grants accumulated wisdom and the patience to use it properly.

0-8-18.name: Potion of Thorned Protection
0-8-18.description: Witch Hazel's gentle warding meets Blood Rose Thorn's aggressive defense. Moonflower balances both, creating protection that heals allies while harming enemies.

0-8-19.name: Philtre of Celestial Warding
0-8-19.description: Witch Hazel protects the earthbound while Stardust connects to cosmic forces. Moonflower mediates this powerful ward that shields against both terrestrial and astral threats.

0-9-10.name: Concoction of Poisoned Beauty
0-9-10.description: Belladonna and Foxglove are the garden's most beautiful killers, blooming under Moonflower's admiring gaze. This brew teaches that true beauty must be respected, never touched carelessly.

0-9-11.name: Infusion of the Wolf's Allure
0-9-11.description: Belladonna enhances beauty while Wolfsbane calls to the beast within. Under Moonflower's light, this potion makes the drinker irresistible to those with wild hearts.

0-9-12.name: Elixir of Seductive Sight
0-9-12.description: Belladonna dilates pupils to darkness while Eye of Newt sharpens what remains. Moonflower reveals this dangerous beauty that sees and is seen in equal measure.

0-9-13.name: Brew of Nine Faces
0-9-13.description: Black Cat's mystery meets Belladonna's transformation under Moonflower's changing phases. This brew allows the drinker to shift their appearance nine times before dawn.

0-9-14.name: Draft of Beautiful Death
0-9-14.description: Graveyard Moss and Belladonna create a potion for undertakers and grief counselors. Moonflower ensures death is seen as beautiful transition rather than fearful ending.

0-9-15.name: Tonic of Bitter Allure
0-9-15.description: Wormwood's harshness cannot diminish Belladonna's appeal. Combined with Moonflower, this brew grants attractiveness born from authenticity rather than artifice.

0-9-16.name: Essence of Dream Beauty
0-9-16.description: Mugwort grants visions of ideal beauty while Belladonna manifests it temporarily. Moonflower ensures the drinker remembers that true beauty comes from within.

0-9-17.name: Potion of the Threshold Lady
0-9-17.description: Elderflower guards doorways while Belladonna transforms those who pass through. Moonflower blesses this rite of passage brew for those becoming their truest selves.

0-9-18.name: Philtre of Blood and Beauty
0-9-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn's pain and Belladonna's beauty intertwine under Moonflower's witness. For those who know that true beauty often requires sacrifice.

0-9-19.name: Concoction of Stellar Grace
0-9-19.description: Stardust's cosmic beauty meets Belladonna's earthly allure. Moonflower connects both realms, granting the drinker grace that seems both otherworldly and intimately familiar.

0-10-11.name: Infusion of Wolf's Warning
0-10-11.description: Foxglove bells ring silent alarms while Wolfsbane marks werewolf territory. Moonflower clarifies these warnings, protecting travelers from wandering into danger.

0-10-12.name: Elixir of Threshold Vision
0-10-12.description: Foxglove guards boundaries while Eye of Newt perceives them. Moonflower illuminates these liminal spaces, granting sight of doorways others cannot see.

0-10-13.name: Brew of Bell and Whisker
0-10-13.description: Foxglove bells chime luck while Black Cat Whisker brings fortune. Moonflower amplifies both, creating synchronicities and happy coincidences for the drinker.

0-10-14.name: Draft of the Garden Grave
0-10-14.description: Foxglove grows tall in graveyards where moss blankets stones. This potion helps gardeners who tend memorial gardens, connecting growth and grief under Moonflower's gentle light.

0-10-15.name: Tonic of Bitter Bells
0-10-15.description: Wormwood's bitterness silences Foxglove's bells into a somber tolling. Moonflower transforms this into a meditation brew for those processing difficult truths.

0-10-16.name: Essence of Prophetic Chimes
0-10-16.description: Foxglove bells ring when futures shift, while Mugwort reveals the changes. Moonflower helps the seer understand which paths lead where in fate's garden.

0-10-17.name: Potion of Elder Guardians
0-10-17.description: Elderflower and Foxglove both guard thresholds between worlds. Combined with Moonflower, this powerful ward protects homes, families, and sacred spaces from all intrusion.

0-10-18.name: Philtre of Thorned Sanctuary
0-10-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn and Foxglove create a garden that welcomes friends and repels foes. Moonflower ensures the distinction between them is always clear.

0-10-19.name: Concoction of Stellar Gardens
0-10-19.description: Foxglove reaches toward Stardust as flowers reach toward sky. Moonflower bridges earth and heaven in this brew that helps gardens thrive even in impossible places.

0-11-12.name: Infusion of the Hunter's Eye
0-11-12.description: Wolfsbane marks the prey while Eye of Newt tracks its path. Moonflower lights the way for hunters who take only what they need and waste nothing.

0-11-13.name: Elixir of Beast and Shadow
0-11-13.description: Black Cat Whisker's stealth combines with Wolfsbane's wild power. Moonflower balances both, granting the drinker the best traits of predator and shadow.

0-11-14.name: Brew of the Wolf's Grave
0-11-14.description: Where old wolves come to die, Graveyard Moss and Wolfsbane grow together. This potion honors warriors at life's end, granting peaceful passage under Moonflower's vigil.

0-11-15.name: Draft of Lone Wandering
0-11-15.description: Wormwood's isolation meets Wolfsbane's solitary howl. Moonflower provides companionship in this brew for those who walk long roads alone by choice or necessity.

0-11-16.name: Tonic of Moon Prophecy
0-11-16.description: Wolfsbane's lunar connection amplifies Mugwort's visions under Moonflower's full power. This potent brew grants prophecies tied to cycles, seasons, and recurring patterns.

0-11-17.name: Essence of the Wild Elder
0-11-17.description: Elderflower's wisdom tempers Wolfsbane's wildness. Moonflower mediates between civilization and savagery in this brew for those who bridge both worlds.

0-11-18.name: Potion of the Blood Hunt
0-11-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn tracks wounded prey while Wolfsbane drives the hunter. Moonflower ensures mercy when the chase ends—a clean kill or merciful release.

0-11-19.name: Philtre of Celestial Howling
0-11-19.description: Wolves howl at the moon which reflects Stardust's distant light. This cosmic brew connects earth's wildest children to heaven's eternal song through Moonflower's translation.

0-12-13.name: Concoction of the Familiar's Eye
0-12-13.description: Black Cat Whisker and Eye of Newt create perfect understanding between witch and familiar. Moonflower seals this bond, allowing shared sight and sensation.

0-12-14.name: Infusion of Cemetery Vision
0-12-14.description: Eye of Newt peers through the veil while Graveyard Moss anchors to burial grounds. Moonflower clarifies these visions of spirits who linger near their bones.

0-12-15.name: Elixir of Bitter Truth
0-12-15.description: Wormwood's harshness combines with Eye of Newt's unflinching sight. Moonflower forces the drinker to see hard truths they've been avoiding, bitter but necessary.

0-12-16.name: Brew of Double Vision
0-12-16.description: Mugwort grants prophetic sight while Eye of Newt sees present truth. Moonflower allows the drinker to perceive both past and future simultaneously.

0-12-17.name: Draft of the Elder's Gaze
0-12-17.description: Elderflower's ancient wisdom meets Eye of Newt's clear perception. Moonflower grants the ability to see situations with the perspective of centuries.

0-12-18.name: Tonic of Bloodsight
0-12-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn marks the target while Eye of Newt tracks every drop spilled. Moonflower helps hunters, healers, and investigators follow trails others miss.

0-12-19.name: Essence of Cosmic Perception
0-12-19.description: Eye of Newt focuses on the infinite while Stardust reveals cosmic patterns. Moonflower grounds these visions so the seer doesn't lose themselves in vastness.

0-13-14.name: Potion of Nine Graves
0-13-14.description: Black Cat's nine lives meet Graveyard Moss's endless death. Moonflower mediates this paradox, granting protection against necromantic curses and undead predation.

0-13-15.name: Philtre of Lucky Bitterness
0-13-15.description: Black Cat Whisker's fortune cannot fully sweeten Wormwood's harsh lessons. Moonflower creates balanced luck—good fortune earned through difficult wisdom.

0-13-16.name: Concoction of Feline Prophecy
0-13-16.description: Cats sense coming earthquakes and storms. This brew combines Black Cat Whisker with Mugwort and Moonflower to grant instinctive foreknowledge of approaching change.

0-13-17.name: Infusion of the Elder Cat
0-13-17.description: The oldest cats know secrets of hearth and home. This brew combines Black Cat Whisker, Elderflower, and Moonflower to grant domestic wisdom and protective blessings.

0-13-18.name: Elixir of Nine Thorns
0-13-18.description: Each of the cat's nine lives leaves a thorn. This potion combines Black Cat Whisker with Blood Rose Thorn and Moonflower, granting resilience through accumulated scars.

0-13-19.name: Brew of Stellar Luck
0-13-19.description: Black Cat Whisker brings earthly fortune while Stardust grants cosmic favor. Moonflower aligns both, creating perfect timing and seemingly miraculous coincidences.

0-14-15.name: Draft of Bitter Graves
0-14-15.description: Graveyard Moss absorbs Wormwood's bitterness from souls that died angry or betrayed. This cleansing brew helps the living release similar resentments before they become toxic.

0-14-16.name: Tonic of Cemetery Dreams
0-14-16.description: Graveyard Moss connects to the dead while Mugwort grants dreams. Moonflower allows respectful communication with ancestors who have wisdom to share.

0-14-17.name: Essence of the Elder Dead
0-14-17.description: Elderflower grows near ancient burial mounds where Graveyard Moss is thickest. This reverent brew honors those who died long ago, keeping their memory alive.

0-14-18.name: Potion of Buried Blood
0-14-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn finds graves of those who died violently. Combined with Graveyard Moss and Moonflower, this brew helps solve murders and bring justice to the restless.

0-14-19.name: Philtre of Cosmic Rest
0-14-19.description: Graveyard Moss anchors to earth while Stardust calls souls home. Moonflower guides this transition, helping spirits who've lingered too long finally find peace.

0-15-16.name: Concoction of Bitter Dreams
0-15-16.description: Wormwood and Mugwort combine to bring harsh but truthful visions. Moonflower softens the blow of prophecies the dreamer wishes weren't true but must hear.

0-15-17.name: Infusion of the Bitter Elder
0-15-17.description: Wormwood's harshness meets Elderflower's age. Moonflower creates wisdom born from suffering—the kind that makes one kinder, not harder, with time.

0-15-18.name: Elixir of Necessary Pain
0-15-18.description: Wormwood purges while Blood Rose Thorn marks what must be cut away. Moonflower gives courage for this painful but necessary transformation and healing.

0-15-19.name: Brew of Bitter Stars
0-15-19.description: Wormwood's earthly bitterness meets Stardust's distant coldness. Moonflower warms this harsh brew that grants perspective on problems too small for cosmic scales.

0-16-17.name: Draft of Prophetic Passage
0-16-17.description: Mugwort reveals futures while Elderflower guards doorways to them. Moonflower grants safe passage to seers who must walk through visions to understand them fully.

0-16-18.name: Tonic of Bleeding Visions
0-16-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn marks prophecies involving violence or sacrifice. Mugwort reveals them clearly while Moonflower gives strength to face or prevent what's foreseen.

0-16-19.name: Essence of Stellar Prophecy
0-16-19.description: Mugwort dreams earth's futures while Stardust reveals cosmic destinies. Moonflower shows how individual choices ripple outward to touch the stars themselves.

0-17-18.name: Potion of the Blood Elder
0-17-18.description: Elderflower grows where blood was spilled long ago, Blood Rose Thorn where it's spilled now. Moonflower connects past violence to present peace, teaching costly lessons.

0-17-19.name: Philtre of Ancient Stars
0-17-19.description: Elderflower remembers when these stars were young. Combined with Stardust and Moonflower, this brew grants perspective that makes centuries feel like moments.

0-18-19.name: Concoction of Bleeding Stars
0-18-19.description: Where stars fall to earth, Blood Rose grows from the impact. This rare brew combines Blood Rose Thorn, Stardust, and Moonflower, marking those destined for legendary deeds.

1-2-3.name: Infusion of Shadow Scale
1-2-3.description: Dragon Scale's fire, Raven Feather's darkness, and Spider Silk's patience create a potion for those who plot grand schemes. For masterminds who weave destruction from the shadows.

1-2-4.name: Elixir of the Shrieking Wing
1-2-4.description: Dragon Scale amplifies Mandrake Root's scream while Raven Feather carries it across distances. A weapon-brew that can shatter glass, break concentration, or signal allies.

1-2-5.name: Brew of the Black Dragon
1-2-5.description: Legends tell of dragons dark as ravens, whose breath was poison not fire. This deadly brew combines Dragon Scale, Raven Feather, and Nightshade for necromantic power.

1-2-6.name: Draft of the Croaking Wyrm
1-2-6.description: Dragon Scale grants kinship with reptiles, Raven Feather with birds, and Toad Tongue translates all. This brew allows communication with any creature that has scales, feathers, or calls.

1-2-7.name: Tonic of Wings and Scales
1-2-7.description: Dragons once flew, bats fly now, and ravens fly always. This powerful brew combines all three essences to grant true flight, not mere levitation.

1-2-8.name: Essence of the Dark Familiar
1-2-8.description: Dragons and ravens both serve witches in old tales. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Raven Feather, and Witch Hazel to create bonds with the most powerful of familiars.

1-2-9.name: Potion of Scaled Beauty
1-2-9.description: Dragon scales shimmer like Belladonna's dark berries under Raven Feather's wing. This vanity brew grants beauty that's fierce and dangerous rather than soft.

1-2-10.name: Philtre of the Dragon's Warning
1-2-10.description: Foxglove bells warn of dragon territory marked by Raven Feather omens. This protective brew alerts the drinker to approaching danger before it strikes.

1-2-11.name: Concoction of Apex Predators
1-2-11.description: Dragon, Raven, and Wolf—three apex hunters combined in one terrifying brew. Wolfsbane channels their collective predatory instinct for those who must become unstoppable.

1-2-12.name: Infusion of the Dragon's Crow
1-2-12.description: Raven Feather scouts what Dragon Scale will destroy, while Eye of Newt records everything. This strategic brew grants perfect battlefield awareness and tactical genius.

1-2-13.name: Elixir of the Dragon's Shadow
1-2-13.description: Black Cat Whisker brings luck to those who ride dragon-back with Raven Feather as guide. This brew grants fortune in the most dangerous undertakings.

1-2-14.name: Brew of the Carrion Wyrm
1-2-14.description: Where dragons fell in ancient battles, ravens feasted and Graveyard Moss grew. This necromantic brew summons memories of legendary conflicts and fallen heroes.

1-2-15.name: Draft of Bitter Omens
1-2-15.description: Wormwood poisons while Dragon Scale burns and Raven Feather predicts doom. This harsh brew forces the drinker to face their worst possible future.

1-2-16.name: Tonic of Draconic Prophecy
1-2-16.description: Dragons dream centuries, ravens see death approaching, and Mugwort reveals all. This potent brew grants visions spanning from ancient past to distant future.

1-2-17.name: Essence of the First Flight
1-2-17.description: Elder dragons taught the first ravens to fly, according to myth. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Raven Feather, and Elderflower to grant mastery of aerial movement.

1-2-18.name: Potion of Blood and Ash
1-2-18.description: Blood Rose Thorn grows where dragons bled, Raven Feather marks where they died. This warrior's brew grants strength drawn from legendary sacrifices.

1-2-19.name: Philtre of Cosmic Wyrms
1-2-19.description: Star-dragons once nested in nebulae, or so legends claim. This extraordinary brew combines Dragon Scale, Raven Feather, and Stardust for cosmic communion.

1-3-4.name: Concoction of Bound Wyrms
1-3-4.description: Spider Silk can bind even dragons if woven correctly, with Mandrake Root anchoring the spell. This brew creates magical restraints that hold supernatural creatures.

1-3-5.name: Infusion of the Poisoned Scale
1-3-5.description: Dragon Scale armors against poison, but Spider Silk delivers Nightshade despite defenses. This assassin's brew bypasses all natural resistance.

1-3-6.name: Elixir of the Scaled Web
1-3-6.description: Spider Silk maps dragon territories while Toad Tongue translates their territorial marks. For those who must navigate lands claimed by greater powers.

1-3-7.name: Brew of Cave Dwellers
1-3-7.description: Young dragons share caves with bats and spiders. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Spider Silk, and Bat Wing to grant perfect comfort in deep underground places.

1-3-8.name: Draft of Wyrm and Ward
1-3-8.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Spider Silk traps enemies, and Witch Hazel shields allies. A perfect defensive brew for protecting what matters most.

1-3-9.name: Tonic of the Beautiful Wyrm
1-3-9.description: Some dragons were beautiful beyond measure. This vanity brew combines Dragon Scale's majesty, Spider Silk's delicacy, and Belladonna's allure for overwhelming presence.

1-3-10.name: Essence of the Dragon's Garden
1-3-10.description: Where dragons nested, flowers grew in their warmth. This brew combines Dragon Scale's heat, Spider Silk's structure, and Foxglove's growth for flourishing gardens.

1-3-11.name: Potion of the Alpha Web
1-3-11.description: Dragon Scale grants dominance, Spider Silk creates hierarchy, and Wolfsbane channels pack instinct. For leaders who must command respect and obedience.

1-3-12.name: Philtre of Eight Scales
1-3-12.description: Spiders have eight legs, dragons eight ways of seeing magic. Combined with Eye of Newt, this brew grants perception of all magical patterns simultaneously.

1-3-13.name: Concoction of Lucky Wyrms
1-3-13.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Spider Silk patience, and Black Cat Whisker fortune. This brew ensures plans succeed through perfect timing and opportunity.

1-3-14.name: Infusion of Ancient Webs
1-3-14.description: In dragon tombs, Spider Silk grows thick across centuries. Combined with Graveyard Moss and Dragon Scale, this brew connects to powers buried with ancient wyrms.

1-3-15.name: Elixir of Bitter Scales
1-3-15.description: Wormwood cannot corrode Dragon Scale, yet Spider Silk binds both. This brew grants resilience against corruption while maintaining ability to feel necessary pain.

1-3-16.name: Brew of Woven Futures
1-3-16.description: Spider Silk weaves destiny, Dragon Scale burns through fate, and Mugwort reveals both paths. This brew shows what is written and what can be changed.

1-3-17.name: Draft of Elder Wyrms
1-3-17.description: The oldest dragons witnessed the first Elder trees. This ancient brew combines Dragon Scale, Spider Silk, and Elderflower for wisdom that spans ages.

1-3-18.name: Tonic of Thorned Scales
1-3-18.description: Dragon Scale armors the body while Blood Rose Thorn armors the heart. Spider Silk connects both, creating warriors who cannot be broken physically or spiritually.

1-3-19.name: Essence of Stellar Webs
1-3-19.description: Spider webs map constellations when covered in dew. This cosmic brew combines Spider Silk, Dragon Scale, and Stardust to read fate written in the stars.

1-4-5.name: Potion of Screaming Fire
1-4-5.description: Dragon Scale's fire meets Mandrake Root's shriek and Nightshade's poison. This weapon-brew creates explosions of flame, sound, and toxin simultaneously.

1-4-6.name: Philtre of Deep Speech
1-4-6.description: Dragon Scale speaks to reptiles, Mandrake Root to earth, and Toad Tongue translates all. This brew grants communication with anything that lives underground.

1-4-7.name: Concoction of the Grounded Dragon
1-4-7.description: Mandrake Root anchors Dragon Scale's power to earth while Bat Wing maintains awareness of sky. For those who must balance opposing forces.

1-4-8.name: Infusion of the Dragon's Garden
1-4-8.description: Dragon Scale provides warmth, Mandrake Root fertile ground, and Witch Hazel protection. This brew makes gardens thrive even in hostile climates.

1-4-9.name: Elixir of the Deadly Wyrm
1-4-9.description: Some dragons breathed poison instead of fire. This lethal brew combines Dragon Scale, Mandrake Root, and Belladonna to create venomous breath attacks.

1-4-10.name: Brew of the Wyrm's Bell
1-4-10.description: Foxglove bells ring when dragons approach, warned by Mandrake Root's earth-sense. Dragon Scale amplifies this warning into a protective alarm system.

1-4-11.name: Draft of Beast Kings
1-4-11.description: Dragon Scale commands reptiles, Wolfsbane commands wolves, and Mandrake Root commands earth. This brew grants dominion over all terrestrial creatures.

1-4-12.name: Tonic of the Dragon's Root
1-4-12.description: Mandrake Root grows where dragon blood soaked earth. Combined with Dragon Scale and Eye of Newt, this brew grants sight of ancient battlefields and buried treasure.

1-4-13.name: Essence of Nine Scales
1-4-13.description: Dragon Scale's power multiplied by Black Cat's nine lives, grounded by Mandrake Root. This brew grants nine chances to survive what should be fatal.

1-4-14.name: Potion of the Buried Wyrm
1-4-14.description: Where dragons are buried, Mandrake and Graveyard Moss grow strongest. This necromantic brew summons draconic spirits for counsel or combat.

1-4-15.name: Philtre of Bitter Fire
1-4-15.description: Wormwood cannot burn but Dragon Scale sets it aflame anyway. Mandrake Root anchors this paradox, creating fire that purges corruption without consuming the pure.

1-4-16.name: Concoction of Dreaming Scales
1-4-16.description: Dragons dream while sleeping on hoarded gold. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Mandrake Root, and Mugwort to grant dreams of wealth, power, and achievement.

1-4-17.name: Infusion of First Roots
1-4-17.description: When Elder trees first grew, dragons guarded them. Combined with Mandrake Root, this ancient brew connects to the world's earliest magic.

1-4-18.name: Elixir of Blood Scales
1-4-18.description: Dragon Scale grows harder when bathed in blood, as Blood Rose Thorn knows. Mandrake Root absorbs both, creating armor that strengthens through combat.

1-4-19.name: Brew of Fallen Stars
1-4-19.description: Dragons collected fallen stars like treasure. This cosmic brew combines Dragon Scale, Mandrake Root, and Stardust to attract good fortune and cosmic power.

1-5-6.name: Draft of the Poisoned Wyrm
1-5-6.description: Dragon Scale resists Nightshade's poison, but Toad Tongue delivers it anyway. This assassin's brew can harm even the most magically protected targets.

1-5-7.name: Tonic of Night Scales
1-5-7.description: Dragons that fly at night share the sky with bats. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Nightshade, and Bat Wing for silent flight and deadly strikes from darkness.

1-5-8.name: Essence of the Dark Wyrm
1-5-8.description: Shadow dragons breathe darkness instead of flame. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Nightshade, and Witch Hazel to grant power over shadows and concealment.

1-5-9.name: Potion of the Deadly Beautiful
1-5-9.description: The most beautiful dragons were often most deadly. This dangerous brew combines Dragon Scale, Nightshade, and Belladonna for lethal charisma.

1-5-10.name: Philtre of the Poisoned Garden
1-5-10.description: Dragon Scale heats soil where Nightshade and Foxglove grow deadlier. This brew teaches mastery over poisonous plants and venomous creatures.

1-5-11.name: Concoction of the Moon Wyrm
1-5-11.description: Some dragons hunted only under the full moon. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Nightshade, and Wolfsbane for power that peaks with lunar cycles.

1-5-12.name: Infusion of Draconic Sight
1-5-12.description: Dragon Scale grants draconic vision, Nightshade dilates pupils to darkness, and Eye of Newt focuses everything. Perfect sight in any condition.

1-5-13.name: Elixir of Scaled Fortune
1-5-13.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Nightshade removes obstacles, and Black Cat Whisker ensures success. For those who make their own luck through strength.

1-5-14.name: Brew of the Death Wyrm
1-5-14.description: Where dragons died, Nightshade and Graveyard Moss absorbed their essence. This necromantic brew grants power over death itself, temporarily.

1-5-15.name: Draft of Purging Fire
1-5-15.description: Dragon Scale burns away what Wormwood and Nightshade kill. This cleansing brew purges disease, poison, and corruption through controlled destruction.

1-5-16.name: Tonic of Dark Dreams
1-5-16.description: Dragon Scale grants power in visions, Nightshade makes them nightmares, and Mugwort reveals what they mean. For those who learn through fear.

1-5-17.name: Essence of the Threshold Wyrm
1-5-17.description: Ancient dragons guarded doorways to other realms. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Nightshade, and Elderflower to grant passage through forbidden places.

1-5-18.name: Potion of Scaled Thorns
1-5-18.description: Dragon Scale armors while Blood Rose Thorn wounds and Nightshade poisons. This warrior's brew makes the drinker's very presence dangerous to enemies.

1-5-19.name: Philtre of Dying Stars
1-5-19.description: When stars die, they explode like dragon fire. This cosmic brew combines Dragon Scale, Nightshade, and Stardust for power born from apocalyptic endings.

1-6-7.name: Concoction of Flying Croakers
1-6-7.description: Dragon Scale grants flight, Toad Tongue communication, and Bat Wing echolocation. This brew allows the drinker to navigate and speak while airborne.

1-6-8.name: Infusion of the Wyrm's Familiar
1-6-8.description: Toads served as familiars to dragon-witches in old tales. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Toad Tongue, and Witch Hazel to create bonds with amphibian allies.

1-6-9.name: Elixir of the Beautiful Beast
1-6-9.description: Dragon Scale provides majesty, Toad Tongue wisdom, and Belladonna beauty. This brew teaches that true beauty includes strength and knowledge.

1-6-10.name: Brew of the Scaled Garden
1-6-10.description: Dragon Scale warms garden pools where toads sing among foxgloves. This harmonious brew promotes balance between fire and water, strength and delicacy.

1-6-11.name: Draft of Beast Speech
1-6-11.description: Dragon Scale speaks to reptiles, Wolfsbane to wolves, and Toad Tongue translates all. This brew grants the ability to communicate with any animal.

1-6-12.name: Tonic of Amphibious Dragons
1-6-12.description: Sea dragons were amphibious like toads. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Toad Tongue, and Eye of Newt to grant comfort in water and on land.

1-6-13.name: Essence of Lucky Scales
1-6-13.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Toad Tongue wisdom, and Black Cat Whisker fortune. This brew ensures the drinker's strength is tempered by luck and sense.

1-6-14.name: Potion of the Swamp Wyrm
1-6-14.description: Where dragons nested in swamps, toads grew large on Graveyard Moss. This brew grants power over wetlands and the creatures dwelling within.

1-6-15.name: Philtre of Bitter Scales
1-6-15.description: Wormwood's bitterness cannot penetrate Dragon Scale, yet Toad Tongue tastes it anyway. This brew grants resilience while maintaining the ability to learn from hardship.

1-6-16.name: Concoction of Croaking Prophecy
1-6-16.description: Toads predict rain, dragons dream futures, and Mugwort reveals both. This brew grants prophecies about natural cycles and coming changes.

1-6-17.name: Infusion of the Elder Beast
1-6-17.description: The oldest toads lived beneath elder trees guarded by ancient dragons. This brew combines all three essences for wisdom that transcends species.

1-6-18.name: Elixir of Thorned Speech
1-6-18.description: Dragon Scale provides courage, Toad Tongue honest speech, and Blood Rose Thorn painful truth. For those who must deliver harsh but necessary words.

1-6-19.name: Brew of Stellar Beasts
1-6-19.description: Dragons flew toward stars while toads sang to them from earth. This cosmic brew combines Dragon Scale, Toad Tongue, and Stardust for universal communication.

1-7-8.name: Draft of the Night Wyrm
1-7-8.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Bat Wing grants night flight, and Witch Hazel protects during darkness. For those who patrol and guard when others sleep.

1-7-9.name: Tonic of Winged Beauty
1-7-9.description: Bat Wing grants graceful flight, Dragon Scale majestic presence, and Belladonna alluring beauty. This brew makes the drinker captivating in motion.

1-7-10.name: Essence of the Flying Garden
1-7-10.description: Dragon Scale heats the air, Bat Wing rides thermals, and Foxglove grows impossibly tall. This brew helps plants thrive in unlikely elevated places.

1-7-11.name: Potion of Apex Flight
1-7-11.description: Dragon Scale, Bat Wing, and Wolfsbane combine the hunting prowess of three apex predators. For those who must hunt from above with perfect precision.

1-7-12.name: Philtre of the Dragon's Wing
1-7-12.description: Dragon Scale remembers when dragons flew, Bat Wing knows flight now, and Eye of Newt sees both. This brew grants aerial mastery and perfect spatial awareness.

1-7-13.name: Concoction of Fortunate Flight
1-7-13.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Bat Wing grants flight, and Black Cat Whisker ensures safe landing. For those who must take dangerous leaps with confidence.

1-7-14.name: Infusion of the Crypt Dragon
1-7-14.description: In ancient crypts, bats nested where dragons were entombed. Combined with Graveyard Moss, this brew connects to the restless spirits of fallen wyrms.

1-7-15.name: Elixir of Bitter Wings
1-7-15.description: Wormwood grounds while Dragon Scale and Bat Wing lift. This paradoxical brew grants mental freedom while maintaining connection to harsh realities.

1-7-16.name: Brew of Flying Dreams
1-7-16.description: Dragon Scale remembers flight, Bat Wing experiences it, and Mugwort dreams of it. This brew grants lucid dreams of soaring through impossible landscapes.

1-7-17.name: Draft of Ancient Wings
1-7-17.description: Elder dragons taught the first bats to navigate darkness. Combined with Elderflower, this ancient brew grants mastery of flight and echolocation.

1-7-18.name: Tonic of Bleeding Flight
1-7-18.description: Dragon Scale and Bat Wing grant flight while Blood Rose Thorn marks the price. For warriors who fly into battle knowing they may fall.

1-7-19.name: Essence of Stellar Flight
1-7-19.description: Dragon Scale aims for stars, Bat Wing navigates by them, and Stardust maps the path. This cosmic brew grants flight beyond atmosphere into space itself.

1-8-9.name: Potion of the Dragon Witch
1-8-9.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Witch Hazel channels it safely, and Belladonna transforms the caster. This traditional brew marks the ascension of a hedge witch to true power.

1-8-10.name: Philtre of the Wyrm's Garden
1-8-10.description: Dragon Scale warms the soil, Witch Hazel protects growth, and Foxglove marks the boundaries. This brew creates gardens that thrive despite hostile conditions.

1-8-11.name: Concoction of the Beast Ward
1-8-11.description: Dragon Scale commands reptiles, Wolfsbane controls wolves, and Witch Hazel wards all others. This protective brew keeps all wild beasts at respectful distance.

1-8-12.name: Infusion of the Witch's Scale
1-8-12.description: Witch Hazel focuses magical sight, Eye of Newt sharpens it, and Dragon Scale reveals draconic enchantments invisible to normal mages.

1-8-13.name: Elixir of the Scaled Familiar
1-8-13.description: Dragon Scale seeks reptilian familiars, Black Cat Whisker brings luck to the bond, and Witch Hazel seals it. For witches who prefer serpents to cats.

1-8-14.name: Brew of the Dragon's Grave
1-8-14.description: Witch Hazel protects those who disturb Dragon Scale in tombs covered with Graveyard Moss. This brew allows safe treasure hunting in draconic burial sites.

1-8-15.name: Draft of Tempered Fire
1-8-15.description: Dragon Scale provides fire, Wormwood bitterness, and Witch Hazel balance. This brew grants passion and power tempered by wisdom and restraint.

1-8-16.name: Tonic of Draconic Vision
1-8-16.description: Dragon Scale grants ancient sight, Mugwort reveals futures, and Witch Hazel interprets both. For seers who must understand visions spanning millennia.

1-8-17.name: Essence of the Elder Wyrm
1-8-17.description: The eldest dragons witnessed the first Elder trees. Combined with Witch Hazel, this brew grants wisdom that bridges nature and magic perfectly.

1-8-18.name: Potion of Scaled Protection
1-8-18.description: Dragon Scale armors, Blood Rose Thorn wounds attackers, and Witch Hazel heals allies. This brew creates reactive defenses that distinguish friend from foe.

1-8-19.name: Philtre of Cosmic Scales
1-8-19.description: Dragon Scale reaches for stars, Stardust answers the call, and Witch Hazel safely channels cosmic power. For those who seek magic beyond earthly limitations.

1-9-10.name: Concoction of Deadly Flowers
1-9-10.description: Dragon Scale heats the garden where Belladonna and Foxglove compete in dangerous beauty. This brew grants appreciation for things both beautiful and lethal.

1-9-11.name: Infusion of the Beast's Beauty
1-9-11.description: Dragon Scale provides raw power, Belladonna transforms it to beauty, and Wolfsbane channels it to grace. For warriors who fight with elegant brutality.

1-9-12.name: Elixir of Seductive Power
1-9-12.description: Dragon Scale radiates might, Belladonna allures, and Eye of Newt ensures all see clearly. This brew makes power itself become irresistibly attractive.

1-9-13.name: Brew of Nine Scales
1-9-13.description: Dragon Scale's power multiplied by Black Cat's nine lives, beautified by Belladonna. This brew grants nine transformations, each more magnificent than the last.

1-9-14.name: Draft of Beautiful Death
1-9-14.description: Dragon Scale marks glorious ends, Belladonna makes them beautiful, and Graveyard Moss honors the fallen. For those who wish to die well and be remembered.

1-9-15.name: Tonic of Bitter Beauty
1-9-15.description: Wormwood's harsh truth cannot diminish Dragon Scale's majesty or Belladonna's allure. This brew teaches that real beauty survives and transcends suffering.

1-9-16.name: Essence of Dream Dragons
1-9-16.description: Dragon Scale dreams power, Mugwort reveals visions, and Belladonna makes them beautiful. This brew grants dreams of glory, achievement, and transformation.

1-9-17.name: Potion of the Elder Beast
1-9-17.description: Ancient dragons possessed terrible beauty. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Belladonna, and Elderflower to grant presence that inspires both awe and fear.

1-9-18.name: Philtre of Blood Scales
1-9-18.description: Dragon Scale armors, Blood Rose Thorn wounds, and Belladonna beautifies both. This brew makes combat itself into a deadly, graceful dance.

1-9-19.name: Concoction of Stellar Majesty
1-9-19.description: Dragon Scale's earthly majesty meets Stardust's cosmic grandeur, enhanced by Belladonna. This brew grants presence that seems simultaneously ancient and eternal.

1-10-11.name: Infusion of the Alpha Garden
1-10-11.description: Dragon Scale commands, Foxglove guards boundaries, and Wolfsbane enforces hierarchy. This brew helps leaders establish and maintain territorial control.

1-10-12.name: Elixir of the Threshold Dragon
1-10-12.description: Foxglove marks doorways, Dragon Scale guards them, and Eye of Newt watches all who pass. This protective brew creates awareness of all who enter your domain.

1-10-13.name: Brew of Fortunate Fire
1-10-13.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Foxglove offers protection, and Black Cat Whisker ensures success. For those whose strength is magnified by timely luck.

1-10-14.name: Draft of the Garden Wyrm
1-10-14.description: Where dragons nested, Foxglove and Graveyard Moss grew in their warming presence. This brew helps gardeners cultivate life even in places marked by death.

1-10-15.name: Tonic of Bitter Growth
1-10-15.description: Wormwood's harshness cannot prevent Foxglove from blooming where Dragon Scale provides warmth. This brew grants resilience and the ability to thrive despite adversity.

1-10-16.name: Essence of Growing Power
1-10-16.description: Dragon Scale provides strength, Foxglove marks growth stages, and Mugwort reveals potential. This brew helps the drinker recognize and nurture developing abilities.

1-10-17.name: Potion of Ancient Boundaries
1-10-17.description: Elder dragons established territories marked by Elderflower and Foxglove. This brew creates wards that last for generations, honored even by the powerful.

1-10-18.name: Philtre of Thorned Scales
1-10-18.description: Dragon Scale armors, Foxglove warns, and Blood Rose Thorn punishes trespassers. This brew creates defenses that escalate appropriately to each threat.

1-10-19.name: Concoction of Stellar Gardens
1-10-19.description: Dragon Scale warms impossible soil where Foxglove grows toward Stardust. This cosmic brew helps life flourish in places no living thing should survive.

1-11-12.name: Infusion of the Alpha's Eye
1-11-12.description: Dragon Scale commands reptiles, Wolfsbane commands wolves, and Eye of Newt watches all. This brew grants perfect awareness of pack dynamics and hierarchy.

1-11-13.name: Elixir of Beast Fortune
1-11-13.description: Dragon Scale and Wolfsbane channel predatory instinct while Black Cat Whisker ensures the hunt succeeds. For hunters who never return empty-handed.

1-11-14.name: Brew of the Beast's Grave
1-11-14.description: Where great predators die, their power lingers. This brew combines Dragon Scale, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss to inherit the strength of legendary hunters.

1-11-15.name: Draft of the Lone Dragon
1-11-15.description: Wormwood brings isolation, Wolfsbane brings howling solitude, and Dragon Scale brings power in loneliness. For those who are strongest when uncompromised by others.

1-11-16.name: Tonic of Predator Dreams
1-11-16.description: Dragon Scale hunts in ancient memory, Wolfsbane in present instinct, and Mugwort in future vision. This brew grants the perfect predatory mindset.

1-11-17.name: Essence of the First Hunt
1-11-17.description: Elder dragons taught wolves to hunt in packs. Combined with Elderflower, this primordial brew grants understanding of cooperation between apex predators.

1-11-18.name: Potion of Blood Hunt
1-11-18.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Wolfsbane tracks scent, and Blood Rose Thorn marks the trail. This brew creates hunters who pursue their quarry with unstoppable determination.

1-11-19.name: Philtre of Cosmic Predators
1-11-19.description: Dragon Scale hunts earth, Wolfsbane hunts moon, and Stardust hunts across galaxies. This brew grants predatory instincts that operate on cosmic scales.

1-12-13.name: Concoction of the Seeing Cat
1-12-13.description: Dragon Scale grants draconic sight, Eye of Newt sharpens vision, and Black Cat Whisker adds feline night-vision. Perfect perception in all conditions.

1-12-14.name: Infusion of the Dragon's Tomb
1-12-14.description: Eye of Newt watches over Dragon Scale buried in Graveyard Moss. This necromantic brew allows communion with the spirits of ancient wyrms.

1-12-15.name: Elixir of Harsh Sight
1-12-15.description: Dragon Scale reveals draconic truths, Eye of Newt sees all clearly, and Wormwood prevents denial. This brew forces perception of uncomfortable realities.

1-12-16.name: Brew of Prophetic Scales
1-12-16.description: Dragon Scale remembers ancient futures, Eye of Newt sees present truth, and Mugwort reveals what's coming. This brew grants temporal perspective spanning eons.

1-12-17.name: Draft of Elder Vision
1-12-17.description: Dragon Scale carries ancient sight, Elderflower provides wisdom, and Eye of Newt focuses both. This brew grants the ability to see as the ancients saw.

1-12-18.name: Tonic of Blood Sight
1-12-18.description: Dragon Scale tracks lineages, Eye of Newt sees bloodlines, and Blood Rose Thorn marks family bonds. This brew reveals hereditary connections and genetic destinies.

1-12-19.name: Essence of Cosmic Eyes
1-12-19.description: Dragon Scale sees magic, Eye of Newt focuses perception, and Stardust reveals cosmic patterns. This brew grants sight of the fundamental forces underlying reality.

1-13-14.name: Potion of Nine Graves
1-13-14.description: Dragon Scale provides nine forms of power, Black Cat nine lives, and Graveyard Moss nine doorways to death. This brew grants supreme protection against mortality.

1-13-15.name: Philtre of Fortunate Fire
1-13-15.description: Dragon Scale provides power, Black Cat Whisker brings luck, and Wormwood keeps both grounded. This brew ensures strength is used wisely and fortune deservedly.

1-13-16.name: Concoction of Lucky Dragons
1-13-16.description: Dragon Scale grants power, Black Cat Whisker fortune, and Mugwort foresight. This brew combines strength, luck, and wisdom for unstoppable success.

1-13-17.name: Infusion of the Elder Cat
1-13-17.description: Ancient cats learned secrets from dragons and shared them with Elderflower. This brew grants access to primordial knowledge jealously guarded by felines.

1-13-18.name: Elixir of Scarred Luck
1-13-18.description: Dragon Scale marks past battles, Blood Rose Thorn present wounds, and Black Cat Whisker ensures survival. For warriors whose luck improves with each scar earned.

1-13-19.name: Brew of Stellar Fortune
1-13-19.description: Dragon Scale reaches for stars, Black Cat Whisker ensures arrival, and Stardust guides the journey. This cosmic brew grants fortune on the grandest scales.

1-14-15.name: Draft of the Bitter Grave
1-14-15.description: Dragon Scale marks ancient death, Graveyard Moss absorbs regrets, and Wormwood purges resentment. This brew helps the living release anger at the departed.

1-14-16.name: Tonic of Dragon Dreams
1-14-16.description: Graveyard Moss connects to buried dragons, Mugwort grants visions, and Dragon Scale channels their power. For necromancers seeking draconic knowledge.

1-14-17.name: Essence of Ancient Tombs
1-14-17.description: Dragon Scale marks the greatest graves, Elderflower grows beside them, and Graveyard Moss covers both. This brew grants access to ancestral wisdom buried ages ago.

1-14-18.name: Potion of Blood and Ash
1-14-18.description: Dragon Scale marks where great ones fell, Blood Rose Thorn grows from their sacrifice, and Graveyard Moss honors their memory. For those who remember heroes.

1-14-19.name: Philtre of Fallen Stars
1-14-19.description: Where stars fell and dragons died, Graveyard Moss absorbed both. Combined with Stardust, this brew connects earthly death to cosmic rebirth.

1-15-16.name: Concoction of Bitter Prophecy
1-15-16.description: Dragon Scale reveals harsh futures, Wormwood forces acceptance, and Mugwort clarifies meaning. This brew grants prophecies the seer wishes they could unlearn.

1-15-17.name: Infusion of Ancient Wisdom
1-15-17.description: Dragon Scale remembers eons, Elderflower witnessed ages, and Wormwood teaches through suffering. This brew grants wisdom earned through witnessing countless rises and falls.

1-15-18.name: Elixir of Earned Power
1-15-18.description: Dragon Scale grants strength, Blood Rose Thorn marks its cost, and Wormwood ensures the price is paid. This brew provides power proportional to suffering endured.

1-15-19.name: Brew of Distant Fire
1-15-19.description: Dragon Scale burns hot, Wormwood cools with bitterness, and Stardust provides cosmic perspective. This brew grants passion tempered by wisdom and universal understanding.

1-16-17.name: Draft of Timeless Vision
1-16-17.description: Dragon Scale sees across eons, Mugwort reveals specific visions, and Elderflower provides context. This brew grants prophetic sight spanning from ancient past to distant future.

1-16-18.name: Tonic of Prophetic Blood
1-16-18.description: Dragon Scale reveals draconic destinies, Mugwort grants visions, and Blood Rose Thorn marks sacrifices required. For seers who must guide others toward painful necessities.

1-16-19.name: Essence of Stellar Prophecy
1-16-19.description: Dragon Scale dreams earth's fate, Mugwort reveals visions, and Stardust shows cosmic destiny. This brew grants prophecies about how individual choices affect universal outcomes.

1-17-18.name: Potion of Ancient Sacrifice
1-17-18.description: Dragon Scale marks legendary deeds, Elderflower witnesses them, and Blood Rose Thorn measures their cost. This brew honors those who gave everything for others.

1-17-19.name: Philtre of First Fire
1-17-19.description: Dragon Scale carries flame from the universe's birth, Elderflower remembers its arrival, and Stardust reveals its source. This primordial brew connects to creation itself.

1-18-19.name: Concoction of Cosmic Wounds
1-18-19.description: Dragon Scale bears ancient scars, Blood Rose Thorn marks new wounds, and Stardust shows how each injury echoes through space-time. For those who understand pain's greater purpose.

2-3-4.name: Infusion of the Shadow Root
2-3-4.description: Raven Feather scouts from above, Spider Silk maps below, and Mandrake Root anchors everything. This brew grants perfect awareness of an entire region's layout and inhabitants.

17-18-19.name: Elixir of the Eternal Bloom
17-18-19.description: The rarest of brews combining Elderflower's ancient wisdom, Blood Rose Thorn's sacrifice, and Stardust's cosmic fire. Said to grant a single moment of perfect clarity about one's true purpose.

16-18-19.name: Draught of Dreaming Stars
16-18-19.description: Mugwort's visions dance with fallen Stardust while Blood Rose Thorn anchors the dreamer to their body. Grants prophetic dreams of cosmic significance.

16-17-19.name: Brew of the Elder Dreamer
16-17-19.description: Mugwort and Elderflower have shared hedgerows since time began. Combined with Stardust, this potion reveals dreams that elder trees have dreamed since the world was young.

16-17-18.name: Tonic of Thorned Visions
16-17-18.description: Mugwort brings prophecy, Elderflower brings passage, and Blood Rose Thorn brings the price. This painful brew shows futures that can only be reached through sacrifice.

15-18-19.name: Essence of Bitter Starfire
15-18-19.description: Wormwood's harsh truth meets the beauty of Stardust and the passion of Blood Rose Thorn. A potion for artists who must suffer for their cosmic inspirations.

15-17-19.name: Philtre of the Wormwood Stars
15-17-19.description: Elderflower opens doors while Wormwood closes illusions. Stardust lights the true path between. For those who seek authenticity over comfort.

15-17-18.name: Concoction of Bitter Roses
15-17-18.description: Three ingredients that teach hard lessons: Wormwood's truth, Elderflower's threshold, and Blood Rose Thorn's pain. Drinking this means accepting that growth requires suffering.

15-16-19.name: Infusion of Absinthe Stars
15-16-19.description: Wormwood and Mugwort create a hallucinatory base that Stardust elevates to cosmic vision. The green fairy dances among constellations in this legendary brew.

15-16-18.name: Draft of Bitter Dreams
15-16-18.description: Wormwood and Mugwort wage war in the dreamer's mind while Blood Rose Thorn determines the victor. Nightmares become trials, and those who wake have grown stronger.

15-16-17.name: Elixir of the Hedge Witch's Truth
15-16-17.description: The three herbs of honest magic: Wormwood for clarity, Mugwort for sight, Elderflower for passage. This traditional brew strips away all self-deception.

14-18-19.name: Potion of Moss and Starlight
14-18-19.description: Graveyard Moss remembers the dead while Stardust recalls their souls' journey. Blood Rose Thorn marks the boundary. A necromantic brew for communing with ancestors.

14-17-19.name: Brew of the Threshold Keeper
14-17-19.description: Graveyard Moss and Elderflower both guard passages between worlds. Stardust illuminates what lies beyond. For those who would glimpse eternity without crossing over.

14-17-18.name: Tonic of Roses on Graves
14-17-18.description: Where Blood Roses grow on moss-covered tombs beneath elder trees, this potion's ingredients are gathered. Grants the ability to sense unfinished business of the dead.

14-16-19.name: Essence of Graveyard Dreams
14-16-19.description: Mugwort brings dreams of those buried beneath Graveyard Moss while Stardust shows where their spirits now wander. A melancholy but peaceful brew.

14-16-18.name: Philtre of Blood Memory
14-16-18.description: Graveyard Moss absorbs the essence of the dead, Mugwort accesses memory, and Blood Rose Thorn pays the price. Grants visions of how ancestors lived and died.

14-16-17.name: Concoction of the Cemetery Elder
14-16-17.description: Old graveyards always have elder trees. This brew combines Graveyard Moss, Mugwort, and Elderflower to grant peaceful communication with long-dead spirits.

14-15-19.name: Infusion of Bitter Graves
14-15-19.description: Wormwood grows wild in abandoned cemeteries. Combined with Graveyard Moss and Stardust, this harsh brew forces confrontation with mortality and what lies beyond.

14-15-18.name: Draft of the Mourner's Truth
14-15-18.description: Graveyard Moss, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn create a brew for those who cannot let go. It reveals whether grief serves the living or chains them to the dead.

14-15-17.name: Elixir of Passage and Ending
14-15-17.description: Graveyard Moss marks where journeys end, Wormwood strips away denial, and Elderflower opens the final door. A brew for those preparing to cross over peacefully.

14-15-16.name: Potion of the Dreaming Dead
14-15-16.description: What do the dead dream beneath their mossy blankets? This brew of Graveyard Moss, Wormwood, and Mugwort reveals their eternal reveries to the living.

13-18-19.name: Brew of Fortunate Stars
13-18-19.description: Black Cat Whisker's luck combines with Stardust's cosmic favor and Blood Rose Thorn's passionate drive. For those who would seize destiny with both hands.

13-17-19.name: Tonic of the Lucky Threshold
13-17-19.description: Black cats guard doorways while elder trees mark them. Stardust blesses passage. This brew ensures safe travel through dangerous transitions and lucky outcomes.

13-17-18.name: Essence of Nine Lives' End
13-17-18.description: Even cats' luck runs out eventually. Black Cat Whisker, Elderflower, and Blood Rose Thorn create a brew for those on their last chance, making it count.

13-16-19.name: Philtre of Lucky Dreams
13-16-19.description: Black Cat Whisker brings fortune to Mugwort's visions while Stardust ensures the dreams reveal winning paths. A gambler's secret for dream-guided decisions.

13-16-18.name: Concoction of Fated Wounds
13-16-18.description: Some injuries are meant to happen. Black Cat Whisker, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn reveal which scars were destined and what purpose they serve.

13-16-17.name: Infusion of the Dreaming Cat
13-16-17.description: Cats dream of hunts and magic. This brew of Black Cat Whisker, Mugwort, and Elderflower grants the ability to share dreams with feline familiars.

13-15-19.name: Draft of Bitter Fortune
13-15-19.description: Wormwood reminds us luck has costs while Black Cat Whisker provides it anyway. Stardust elevates the stakes. For those who would gamble everything on truth.

13-15-18.name: Elixir of the Cat's Nine Truths
13-15-18.description: Black Cat Whisker, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn reveal nine harsh truths the drinker has avoided. Lucky are those who face them and grow.

13-15-17.name: Potion of Lucky Passage
13-15-17.description: Black cats crossing paths, wormwood clearing vision, elderflower opening doors. This brew ensures fortunate timing when passing through dangerous transitions.

13-15-16.name: Brew of the Cat's Dream
13-15-16.description: Black Cat Whisker, Wormwood, and Mugwort combine into a brew that grants cat-like intuition in dreams, helping the sleeper land on their feet in any situation.

13-14-19.name: Tonic of Graveyard Luck
13-14-19.description: Black cats walk cemetery walls where Graveyard Moss grows. Stardust marks the fortunate graves. This brew reveals which ancestors still watch over the drinker.

13-14-18.name: Essence of Nine Deaths Remembered
13-14-18.description: Black Cat Whisker, Graveyard Moss, and Blood Rose Thorn honor those who died that others might live. Grants awareness of sacrifices made on the drinker's behalf.

13-14-17.name: Philtre of the Cemetery Cat
13-14-17.description: Cemetery cats guard the boundary between living and dead. This brew of Black Cat Whisker, Graveyard Moss, and Elderflower grants their protective sight.

13-14-16.name: Concoction of Lucky Spirits
13-14-16.description: Black Cat Whisker, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort create a brew for séances, ensuring only benevolent spirits answer and protecting against malevolent entities.

13-14-15.name: Infusion of the Bitter Cat
13-14-15.description: Black Cat Whisker, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood combine into a harsh but protective brew. Strips away false friends and reveals who truly has the drinker's back.

12-18-19.name: Draft of the Newt's Cosmos
12-18-19.description: Eye of Newt sees the small while Stardust reveals the vast. Blood Rose Thorn connects them. This brew grants understanding of how tiny actions ripple across the universe.

12-17-19.name: Elixir of Starlit Transformation
12-17-19.description: Eye of Newt knows transformation, Elderflower knows passage, Stardust knows eternity. This brew guides metamorphosis of the soul toward its highest cosmic purpose.

12-17-18.name: Potion of the Newt's Sacrifice
