12-17-18.description: Newts regenerate what they lose. Combined with Elderflower's passage and Blood Rose Thorn's pain, this brew teaches that some sacrifices lead to greater wholeness.

12-16-19.name: Brew of Visionary Eyes
12-16-19.description: Eye of Newt focuses sight while Mugwort opens the inner eye. Stardust expands vision to cosmic scale. A powerful divination brew for far-seeing prophecy.

12-16-18.name: Tonic of Bleeding Visions
12-16-18.description: Eye of Newt, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn create visions that cost the seer. The more painful the sight, the more true the prophecy revealed.

12-16-17.name: Essence of the Seer's Gate
12-16-17.description: Eye of Newt sees, Mugwort dreams, Elderflower opens. This traditional seer's brew creates a gateway to the realm of pure vision and prophetic truth.

12-15-19.name: Philtre of Clarified Stars
12-15-19.description: Wormwood strips illusion while Eye of Newt focuses and Stardust illuminates. This brew reveals cosmic truths without the comfort of beautiful lies.

12-15-18.name: Concoction of the Watching Wound
12-15-18.description: Eye of Newt, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn create a harsh brew that forces the drinker to truly see and accept wounds they've ignored or denied.

12-15-17.name: Infusion of Clear Passage
12-15-17.description: Eye of Newt sees the path, Wormwood clears obstacles, Elderflower opens the way. For those who must navigate treacherous transitions with perfect clarity.

12-15-16.name: Draft of Sober Dreams
12-15-16.description: Wormwood and Eye of Newt strip pleasant illusions from Mugwort's dreams. This harsh brew reveals what the subconscious truly fears and desires.

12-14-19.name: Elixir of Death's Gaze
12-14-19.description: Eye of Newt combined with Graveyard Moss and Stardust grants the ability to see spirits and the faint trails they leave moving between the stars.

12-14-18.name: Potion of the Watching Dead
12-14-18.description: Eye of Newt, Graveyard Moss, and Blood Rose Thorn reveal which dead still watch over the living and what they hope to see accomplished.

12-14-17.name: Brew of the Necromancer's Sight
12-14-17.description: Eye of Newt sees the dead, Graveyard Moss connects to them, Elderflower permits passage. A traditional necromantic brew for speaking with spirits.

12-14-16.name: Tonic of Grave Dreams
12-14-16.description: Eye of Newt, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort let the drinker dream the last dreams of those buried nearby. Handle with care and respect.

12-14-15.name: Essence of Bitter Sight
12-14-15.description: Eye of Newt, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood force the drinker to see death clearly—their own mortality and the brevity of all things.

12-13-19.name: Philtre of Lucky Sight
12-13-19.description: Black Cat Whisker's fortune guides Eye of Newt's vision toward Stardust's opportunities. This brew reveals lucky chances before they pass.

12-13-18.name: Concoction of Nine-Eyed Fortune
12-13-18.description: Eye of Newt, Black Cat Whisker, and Blood Rose Thorn combine to reveal which risks are worth the pain and which lucky chances should be seized despite cost.

12-13-17.name: Infusion of the Watching Cat
12-13-17.description: Cats and newts both watch with ancient knowing. Combined with Elderflower's wisdom, this brew grants the ability to see through deception and illusion.

12-13-16.name: Draft of Lucky Visions
12-13-16.description: Eye of Newt, Black Cat Whisker, and Mugwort create prophetic dreams that focus on fortunate outcomes and paths to achieve them.

12-13-15.name: Elixir of True Fortune
12-13-15.description: Eye of Newt sees clearly, Black Cat Whisker brings luck, Wormwood strips falsehood. This brew reveals whether apparent good fortune is genuine or trap.

12-13-14.name: Potion of the Cemetery Watch
12-13-14.description: Eye of Newt, Black Cat Whisker, and Graveyard Moss create a guardian's brew, granting the ability to watch over sacred spaces and sense intrusion.

11-18-19.name: Brew of the Moon Wolf's Heart
11-18-19.description: Wolfsbane's lunar power combines with Blood Rose Thorn's passion and Stardust's cosmic fire. For those whose wild heart howls at stars beyond the moon.

11-17-19.name: Tonic of the Elder Hunt
11-17-19.description: Wolfsbane marks the predator, Elderflower marks the threshold, Stardust marks the eternal. This brew grants the instincts of wolves who hunt between worlds.

11-17-18.name: Essence of Thorned Moonlight
11-17-18.description: Wolfsbane blooms under the moon where Blood Roses grow near elder trees. This brew grants fierce protection of loved ones and territory.

11-16-19.name: Philtre of Howling Dreams
11-16-19.description: Wolfsbane's call, Mugwort's visions, and Stardust's vastness combine. This brew grants dreams of running with celestial wolf packs across the night sky.

11-16-18.name: Concoction of the Wounded Wolf
11-16-18.description: Wolfsbane, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn create a warrior's brew. Grants the ability to fight on through injury and find strength in pain.

11-16-17.name: Infusion of Pack Dreams
11-16-17.description: Wolfsbane, Mugwort, and Elderflower allow the drinker to share dreams with their chosen pack—whether wolves, familiars, or trusted companions.

11-15-19.name: Draft of the Lone Wolf
11-15-19.description: Wormwood's isolation meets Wolfsbane's wild nature under Stardust's distant light. For those who must walk alone and find strength in solitude.

11-15-18.name: Elixir of Bitter Fangs
11-15-18.description: Wolfsbane, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn combine into a predator's brew. Grants the ferocity to face harsh truths and tear through comfortable lies.

11-15-17.name: Potion of the Wild Threshold
11-15-17.description: Wolfsbane's wild, Wormwood's bitter, Elderflower's liminal. This brew helps those trapped between civilized life and their wild nature find balance.

11-15-16.name: Brew of Lucid Howling
11-15-16.description: Wolfsbane, Wormwood, and Mugwort create lucid dreams where the dreamer runs as a wolf, fully aware and in control of their wild dream-self.

11-14-19.name: Tonic of the Ghost Wolf
11-14-19.description: Wolfsbane, Graveyard Moss, and Stardust call to wolves who died long ago. Their spirits can be glimpsed running between graves under starlit skies.

11-14-18.name: Essence of the Wolf's Grave
11-14-18.description: Where wolves are buried, Wolfsbane grows through Graveyard Moss. Blood Rose Thorn marks the warrior's rest. This brew honors fierce spirits.

11-14-17.name: Philtre of the Ancestral Pack
11-14-17.description: Wolfsbane, Graveyard Moss, and Elderflower connect the drinker to wolves and wolf-kin from their ancestral line, granting inherited instincts.

11-14-16.name: Concoction of Wolfish Dreams
11-14-16.description: Wolfsbane, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort let the drinker dream as their ancestors did—running in ancient forests under moons long since waned.

11-14-15.name: Infusion of the Bitter Hunt
11-14-15.description: Wolfsbane, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood create a harsh brew for hunters of the undead. Grants the ability to sense and track risen corpses.

11-13-19.name: Draft of the Lucky Predator
11-13-19.description: Black Cat Whisker's luck guides Wolfsbane's hunt under Stardust's light. This brew ensures prey is found and the hunt succeeds.

11-13-18.name: Elixir of Claws and Fangs
11-13-18.description: Cats and wolves are both predators. Black Cat Whisker, Wolfsbane, and Blood Rose Thorn grant primal combat instincts and lucky strikes.

11-13-17.name: Potion of the Familiar's Hunt
11-13-17.description: Black Cat Whisker, Wolfsbane, and Elderflower allow witch and familiar to hunt as one, sharing senses and instincts across the bond.

11-13-16.name: Brew of Hunting Dreams
11-13-16.description: Black Cat Whisker, Wolfsbane, and Mugwort create dreams of the chase. The dreamer hunts alongside cat and wolf, learning predatory wisdom.

11-13-15.name: Tonic of Bitter Hunters
11-13-15.description: Black Cat Whisker, Wolfsbane, and Wormwood create a brew for those who hunt evil. Grants the ability to sense dark creatures and ill intent.

11-13-14.name: Essence of the Graveyard Pack
11-13-14.description: Black Cat Whisker, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss summon the protective spirits of cats and wolves buried in sacred ground.

11-12-19.name: Philtre of the Watchful Wolf
11-12-19.description: Eye of Newt's clarity combines with Wolfsbane's alertness and Stardust's vast perspective. Nothing escapes the notice of one who drinks this brew.

11-12-18.name: Concoction of Predator's Sight
11-12-18.description: Eye of Newt, Wolfsbane, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the visual acuity of a hunting wolf. Every movement, every weakness is seen and understood.

11-12-17.name: Infusion of the Hunter's Gate
11-12-17.description: Eye of Newt spots prey, Wolfsbane drives the hunt, Elderflower opens the way. For those who track quarry between the worlds.

11-12-16.name: Draft of Watchful Sleep
11-12-16.description: Eye of Newt, Wolfsbane, and Mugwort grant the wolf's ability to sleep with one eye open, aware of danger even in deepest dreams.

11-12-15.name: Elixir of the Clear Hunt
11-12-15.description: Eye of Newt sees truth, Wolfsbane provides instinct, Wormwood strips distraction. This brew focuses the hunter on what truly matters.

11-12-14.name: Potion of Graveyard Stalking
11-12-14.description: Eye of Newt, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss grant the ability to track spirits and sense undead movement through burial grounds.

11-12-13.name: Brew of Lucky Hunters
11-12-13.description: Eye of Newt, Wolfsbane, and Black Cat Whisker ensure the hunt succeeds. Prey cannot hide from such fortunate and watchful pursuit.

10-18-19.name: Tonic of the Bleeding Bell
10-18-19.description: Foxglove bells ring for heart's blood, Blood Rose Thorn draws it forth, Stardust carries it skyward. A potion of passionate sacrifice.

10-17-19.name: Essence of the Faerie Gate
10-17-19.description: Foxglove, Elderflower, and Stardust combine in this traditional brew for opening passages to faerie realms. Enter at your own risk.

10-17-18.name: Philtre of the Thorned Garden
10-17-18.description: Foxglove and Blood Rose grow together in witch's gardens beneath elder trees. This brew grants mastery over protective and beautiful plants.

10-16-19.name: Concoction of Fairy Dreams
10-16-19.description: Foxglove, Mugwort, and Stardust create dreams of faerie revels. The drinker dances with the fae but wakes safely in their own bed.

10-16-18.name: Infusion of Heart's Vision
10-16-18.description: Foxglove affects the heart while Mugwort opens vision. Blood Rose Thorn ensures the visions shown are what the heart truly needs to see.

10-16-17.name: Draft of the Elder Garden
10-16-17.description: Foxglove, Mugwort, and Elderflower grow in old gardens tended by generations of witches. This brew connects to that lineage of green wisdom.

10-15-19.name: Elixir of Bitter Beauty
10-15-19.description: Foxglove's deadly beauty meets Wormwood's harsh truth under Stardust's eternal light. This brew teaches that true beauty survives truth's scrutiny.

10-15-18.name: Potion of the Painful Garden
10-15-18.description: Foxglove, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn grow in gardens of hard lessons. This brew grants the wisdom that comes only through difficulty.

10-15-17.name: Brew of the Hedge Garden
10-15-17.description: Foxglove, Wormwood, and Elderflower mark the boundary between cultivated and wild. This brew helps navigate the space between civilization and nature.

10-15-16.name: Tonic of Garden Dreams
10-15-16.description: Foxglove, Wormwood, and Mugwort create dreams of gardens—some beautiful, some harsh, all teaching. The dreamer tends and learns.

10-14-19.name: Essence of Cemetery Flowers
10-14-19.description: Foxglove blooms among graves under starlight. Combined with Graveyard Moss and Stardust, this brew reveals which spirits tend the flowers above their resting places.

10-14-18.name: Philtre of Funerary Roses
10-14-18.description: Foxglove, Graveyard Moss, and Blood Rose Thorn are traditional funeral offerings. This brew carries messages to the beloved dead.

10-14-17.name: Concoction of the Garden Gate
10-14-17.description: Foxglove and Elderflower both grow near thresholds where Graveyard Moss creeps. This brew reveals hidden gateways in old gardens and churchyards.

10-14-16.name: Infusion of Memorial Dreams
10-14-16.description: Foxglove, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort let the drinker dream with those they've lost, sharing one more conversation in the garden of memory.

10-14-15.name: Draft of Grave Truths
10-14-15.description: Foxglove, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood strip away gentle lies about death. This harsh brew forces acceptance of mortality's reality.

10-13-19.name: Elixir of the Lucky Heart
10-13-19.description: Foxglove affects the heart while Black Cat Whisker brings fortune. Stardust elevates both. A brew for those gambling on love.

10-13-18.name: Potion of Fortunate Wounds
10-13-18.description: Foxglove, Black Cat Whisker, and Blood Rose Thorn reveal which heartbreaks led to better paths. A brew for healing romantic regret.

10-13-17.name: Brew of the Garden Cat
10-13-17.description: Black cats hunting in foxglove gardens beneath elder trees is a blessed sight. This brew brings that blessing home as protection and luck.

10-13-16.name: Tonic of Lucky Garden Dreams
10-13-16.description: Foxglove, Black Cat Whisker, and Mugwort create dreams of wandering through fortunate gardens where every plant grants gifts.

10-13-15.name: Essence of Honest Fortune
10-13-15.description: Foxglove, Black Cat Whisker, and Wormwood ensure that luck comes without hidden costs. What fortune brings is truly deserved.

10-13-14.name: Philtre of the Graveyard Garden
10-13-14.description: Foxglove, Black Cat Whisker, and Graveyard Moss protect cemetery gardens and those who tend them. Grants safe passage through haunted grounds.

10-12-19.name: Concoction of the Seeing Heart
10-12-19.description: Eye of Newt sees while Foxglove feels. Stardust connects heart and eye to cosmic truth. A brew for those who would see with love's clarity.

10-12-18.name: Infusion of Heartfelt Vision
10-12-18.description: Eye of Newt, Foxglove, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the ability to see others' true hearts—their loves, fears, and hidden wounds.

10-12-17.name: Draft of the Garden Watcher
10-12-17.description: Eye of Newt, Foxglove, and Elderflower create a garden guardian's brew. Nothing happens in the witch's garden without your awareness.

10-12-16.name: Elixir of Blooming Visions
10-12-16.description: Eye of Newt, Foxglove, and Mugwort grant prophetic visions that unfold like flowers blooming, each petal revealing more detail.

10-12-15.name: Potion of Clear Gardens
10-12-15.description: Eye of Newt, Foxglove, and Wormwood reveal what truly grows in any garden—the helpful, the harmful, and the hidden.

10-12-14.name: Brew of Cemetery Watching
10-12-14.description: Eye of Newt, Foxglove, and Graveyard Moss grant the sight to watch over beloved graves and see what visits them by night.

10-12-13.name: Tonic of Lucky Watchers
10-12-13.description: Eye of Newt, Foxglove, and Black Cat Whisker grant fortunate vigilance. The drinker notices lucky opportunities others miss.

10-11-19.name: Essence of the Moon Garden
10-11-19.description: Foxglove and Wolfsbane both bloom under moonlight, touched by Stardust. This brew grants mastery over night-blooming plants and lunar gardening.

10-11-18.name: Philtre of Thorned Moonlight
10-11-18.description: Foxglove, Wolfsbane, and Blood Rose Thorn create a fiercely protective brew for those who guard gardens against night predators.

10-11-17.name: Concoction of the Wild Garden
10-11-17.description: Foxglove, Wolfsbane, and Elderflower mark where cultivation meets wilderness. This brew helps find balance between taming and letting grow wild.

10-11-16.name: Infusion of Moonlit Dreams
10-11-16.description: Foxglove, Wolfsbane, and Mugwort create dreams of gardens under full moons where flowers sing and wolves walk peacefully among the beds.

10-11-15.name: Draft of Bitter Blooms
10-11-15.description: Foxglove, Wolfsbane, and Wormwood—three bitter beauties. This brew teaches that what tastes harsh often heals deepest.

10-11-14.name: Elixir of Moonlit Graves
10-11-14.description: Foxglove, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss grow together in old churchyards. This brew connects to the peaceful dead who rest in consecrated ground.

10-11-13.name: Potion of the Hunter's Garden
10-11-13.description: Foxglove, Wolfsbane, and Black Cat Whisker protect gardens from those who would steal or destroy. Trespassers find their luck turns sour.

10-11-12.name: Brew of Watchful Gardens
10-11-12.description: Eye of Newt, Foxglove, and Wolfsbane create an ever-vigilant garden. Every plant becomes a sentinel, every flower an eye.

9-18-19.name: Tonic of the Deadly Star
9-18-19.description: Belladonna's fatal beauty combines with Blood Rose Thorn's passion and Stardust's eternity. A potion for those who would burn bright and brief.

9-17-19.name: Essence of the Beautiful Threshold
9-17-19.description: Belladonna, Elderflower, and Stardust create a dangerously seductive brew for crossing between worlds. The passage is pleasant but the return uncertain.

9-17-18.name: Philtre of Deadly Roses
9-17-18.description: Belladonna and Blood Rose share deadly beauty. Combined with Elderflower, this brew grants the power to be both irresistible and untouchable.

9-16-19.name: Concoction of Poisoned Stars
9-16-19.description: Belladonna, Mugwort, and Stardust create visions of terrible beauty—cosmic truths too magnificent and dangerous for mortal minds.

9-16-18.name: Infusion of Beautiful Nightmares
9-16-18.description: Belladonna, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn bring dreams of exquisite terror. The dreamer wakes shaken but somehow more alive.

9-16-17.name: Draft of the Deadly Elder
9-16-17.description: Belladonna and Elderflower both guard thresholds dangerously. Mugwort reveals what lies beyond. For those brave enough to peek past death's veil.

9-15-19.name: Elixir of Bitter Beauty
9-15-19.description: Belladonna's beauty, Wormwood's truth, Stardust's eternity. This brew strips beautiful lies from ugly truths and reveals what remains worth loving.

9-15-18.name: Potion of Beautiful Pain
9-15-18.description: Belladonna, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn. Some beauty only comes through suffering, some truth only through pain. This brew teaches both lessons.

9-15-17.name: Brew of the Poisoned Gate
9-15-17.description: Belladonna and Wormwood guard while Elderflower opens. Only those who can survive bitter truth pass through the threshold this brew reveals.

9-15-16.name: Tonic of Dangerous Dreams
9-15-16.description: Belladonna, Wormwood, and Mugwort create dreams that could kill the weak-willed. Survivors emerge with visions of terrible clarity.

9-14-19.name: Essence of Beautiful Death
9-14-19.description: Belladonna, Graveyard Moss, and Stardust reveal death's strange beauty. This necromantic brew helps the dying let go and the grieving accept.

9-14-18.name: Philtre of the Beloved's Grave
9-14-18.description: Belladonna, Graveyard Moss, and Blood Rose Thorn are placed on lovers' graves. This brew connects to those who died for or because of love.

9-14-17.name: Concoction of the Beautiful End
9-14-17.description: Belladonna, Graveyard Moss, and Elderflower prepare a peaceful passage. This brew eases the dying and comforts those who must watch.

9-14-16.name: Infusion of Death's Dreams
9-14-16.description: Belladonna, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort let the drinker dream as the dying dream—seeing life's meaning crystallize at its end.

9-14-15.name: Draft of Honest Death
9-14-15.description: Belladonna, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood strip away denial about mortality. This harsh brew forces confrontation with inevitable endings.

9-13-19.name: Elixir of Deadly Fortune
9-13-19.description: Belladonna, Black Cat Whisker, and Stardust. Some luck is dangerous to possess. This brew grants fortune that others will kill to take.

9-13-18.name: Potion of Fatal Attraction
9-13-18.description: Belladonna, Black Cat Whisker, and Blood Rose Thorn grant irresistible allure. The lucky ones merely fall in love; others may fall further.

9-13-17.name: Brew of the Beautiful Cat
9-13-17.description: Belladonna, Black Cat Whisker, and Elderflower grant feline grace and deadly beauty. Move through the world untouchable and admired.

9-13-16.name: Tonic of Seductive Dreams
9-13-16.description: Belladonna, Black Cat Whisker, and Mugwort create dreams where the dreamer is irresistibly beautiful. Some wake with lasting confidence.

9-13-15.name: Essence of Honest Beauty
9-13-15.description: Belladonna, Black Cat Whisker, and Wormwood reveal whether beauty is genuine or merely glamour. Truth survives; illusion withers.

9-13-14.name: Philtre of Graveyard Beauty
9-13-14.description: Belladonna, Black Cat Whisker, and Graveyard Moss. Cemetery cats know which graves hold those who were truly beautiful in life.

9-12-19.name: Concoction of Deadly Sight
9-12-19.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Stardust grant vision of fatal beauty—the ability to see what could destroy you and find it magnificent.

9-12-18.name: Infusion of the Beautiful Wound
9-12-18.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Blood Rose Thorn reveal which scars make us more beautiful and which merely disfigure.

9-12-17.name: Draft of Seeing Beauty
9-12-17.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Elderflower grant the ability to see beauty where others see only plainness or decay.

9-12-16.name: Elixir of Beautiful Visions
9-12-16.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Mugwort create visions of terrible beauty—prophecies dressed in splendor regardless of their content.

9-12-15.name: Potion of True Beauty
9-12-15.description: Eye of Newt sees, Belladonna beautifies, Wormwood clarifies. This brew reveals what is genuinely beautiful versus merely pretty.

9-12-14.name: Brew of Beautiful Spirits
9-12-14.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Graveyard Moss reveal the beautiful dead—spirits who carry their living grace into death.

9-12-13.name: Tonic of Seeing Fortune
9-12-13.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Black Cat Whisker reveal lucky beauty—the moments when appearance and opportunity align.

9-11-19.name: Essence of Moonlit Poison
9-11-19.description: Belladonna and Wolfsbane both gain potency under moonlight. Combined with Stardust, this brew teaches respect for beautiful dangers.

9-11-18.name: Philtre of the Deadly Moon
9-11-18.description: Belladonna, Wolfsbane, and Blood Rose Thorn create a warrior's beauty brew. Look magnificent while remaining utterly dangerous.

9-11-17.name: Concoction of Fatal Thresholds
9-11-17.description: Belladonna, Wolfsbane, and Elderflower guard passages lethally. This brew creates wards that punish unauthorized crossing beautifully.

9-11-16.name: Infusion of Deadly Dreams
9-11-16.description: Belladonna, Wolfsbane, and Mugwort create dreams of being the predator rather than prey—beautiful, deadly, and free.

9-11-15.name: Draft of Bitter Poisons
9-11-15.description: Belladonna, Wolfsbane, and Wormwood. Three poisons, three truths, three chances to grow stronger by surviving what should kill.

9-11-14.name: Elixir of Poisoned Graves
9-11-14.description: Belladonna, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss grow where the murdered rest. This brew reveals deaths that were neither natural nor peaceful.

9-11-13.name: Potion of Lucky Poison
9-11-13.description: Belladonna, Wolfsbane, and Black Cat Whisker grant the luck to survive poisons—physical, emotional, or social—that should prove fatal.

9-11-12.name: Brew of Poison Sight
9-11-12.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Wolfsbane grant the ability to see poison in all its forms—in cups, in words, in smiles.

9-10-19.name: Tonic of the Deadly Garden
9-10-19.description: Belladonna and Foxglove are sisters in the poison garden. Stardust blesses their deadly beauty. A brew for those who cultivate dangerous things.

9-10-18.name: Essence of Thorned Sisters
9-10-18.description: Belladonna, Foxglove, and Blood Rose Thorn—three dangerous beauties. This brew grants kinship with all things beautiful and deadly.

9-10-17.name: Philtre of the Fatal Garden
9-10-17.description: Belladonna, Foxglove, and Elderflower create the ultimate witch's garden brew. Complete mastery over plants that heal by harming.

9-10-16.name: Concoction of Garden Nightmares
9-10-16.description: Belladonna, Foxglove, and Mugwort create dreams of walking through gardens where every flower is beautiful, every flower is deadly.

9-10-15.name: Infusion of Bitter Gardens
9-10-15.description: Belladonna, Foxglove, and Wormwood. The witch's garden teaches hard lessons. This brew grants the wisdom to learn them without dying.

9-10-14.name: Draft of Funeral Flowers
9-10-14.description: Belladonna, Foxglove, and Graveyard Moss. Traditional funeral flowers for witches. This brew honors magical dead with appropriate beauty.

9-10-13.name: Elixir of Lucky Beauty
9-10-13.description: Belladonna, Foxglove, and Black Cat Whisker grant the luck to be beautiful without the danger. Safe glamour for everyday use.

9-10-12.name: Potion of Garden Sight
9-10-12.description: Eye of Newt, Belladonna, and Foxglove reveal every plant's true nature—which heal, which harm, which do both depending on dosage.

9-10-11.name: Brew of the Moon's Poison Garden
9-10-11.description: Belladonna, Foxglove, and Wolfsbane bloom together under full moons. This brew grants communion with all toxic night-bloomers.

8-18-19.name: Tonic of the Witch's Star
8-18-19.description: Witch Hazel, Blood Rose Thorn, and Stardust combine traditional craft with cosmic power. For witches ready to work magic on universal scales.

8-17-19.name: Essence of the Elder Witch
8-17-19.description: Witch Hazel, Elderflower, and Stardust honor crones who have walked the path longest. This brew grants access to accumulated wisdom.

8-17-18.name: Philtre of the Thorned Witch
8-17-18.description: Witch Hazel, Elderflower, and Blood Rose Thorn. Some witchcraft requires sacrifice. This brew teaches what must be given to gain power.

8-16-19.name: Concoction of the Dreaming Witch
8-16-19.description: Witch Hazel, Mugwort, and Stardust create a witch's dreaming brew. Practice magic in dreams, then wake to find the workings begun.

8-16-18.name: Infusion of Witch's Blood
8-16-18.description: Witch Hazel, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn awaken dormant magical bloodlines. For those who suspect witch ancestry but lack proof.

8-16-17.name: Draft of the Dream Coven
8-16-17.description: Witch Hazel, Mugwort, and Elderflower allow witches to meet in dreams. Distant covens can gather without traveling in body.

8-15-19.name: Elixir of Honest Witchcraft
8-15-19.description: Witch Hazel, Wormwood, and Stardust strip away romantic notions of magic. This brew reveals witchcraft's true costs and rewards.

8-15-18.name: Potion of the Suffering Witch
8-15-18.description: Witch Hazel, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn. Real magic often hurts. This brew grants the fortitude to work through pain.

8-15-17.name: Brew of Bitter Wisdom
8-15-17.description: Witch Hazel, Wormwood, and Elderflower. The eldest witches know the harshest truths. This brew grants their hard-won knowledge.

8-15-16.name: Tonic of the Witch's Dreams
8-15-16.description: Witch Hazel, Wormwood, and Mugwort create dreams of magical training. The dreamer learns spells that sometimes work upon waking.

8-14-19.name: Essence of the Graveyard Witch
8-14-19.description: Witch Hazel, Graveyard Moss, and Stardust. Some witches work best among the dead. This brew opens those paths safely.

8-14-18.name: Philtre of Witch's Mourning
8-14-18.description: Witch Hazel, Graveyard Moss, and Blood Rose Thorn honor witches who have passed. This brew connects living practitioners to dead mentors.

8-14-17.name: Concoction of the Ancestor Witch
8-14-17.description: Witch Hazel, Graveyard Moss, and Elderflower reveal witch ancestors in the family line and the gifts they passed down.

8-14-16.name: Infusion of Necromantic Dreams
8-14-16.description: Witch Hazel, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort allow witches to learn necromancy safely in dreams before attempting waking practice.

8-14-15.name: Draft of Grave Truths
8-14-15.description: Witch Hazel, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood. The dead know truths the living hide from. This harsh brew reveals them.

8-13-19.name: Elixir of the Lucky Witch
8-13-19.description: Witch Hazel, Black Cat Whisker, and Stardust. Some witches are born fortunate. This brew grants a taste of their blessed path.

8-13-18.name: Potion of the Witch's Sacrifice
8-13-18.description: Witch Hazel, Black Cat Whisker, and Blood Rose Thorn. Luck has costs. This brew ensures sacrifices made in magic are rewarded.

8-13-17.name: Brew of the Familiar's Bond
8-13-17.description: Witch Hazel, Black Cat Whisker, and Elderflower create and strengthen familiar bonds. For witches seeking their animal companion.

8-13-16.name: Tonic of Familiar Dreams
8-13-16.description: Witch Hazel, Black Cat Whisker, and Mugwort let witch and familiar share dreams, deepening their bond and understanding.

8-13-15.name: Essence of Honest Familiars
8-13-15.description: Witch Hazel, Black Cat Whisker, and Wormwood reveal whether a familiar bond is genuine or merely convenient for both parties.

8-13-14.name: Philtre of Cemetery Cats
8-13-14.description: Witch Hazel, Black Cat Whisker, and Graveyard Moss connect to the cats who guard burial grounds and the witch-spirits they serve.

8-12-19.name: Concoction of the Seeing Witch
8-12-19.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Stardust grant the witch's sight—the ability to see magic, spirits, and hidden truths.

8-12-18.name: Infusion of Bloody Sight
8-12-18.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the ability to see blood magic, curses, and workings done in pain.

8-12-17.name: Draft of Elder Sight
8-12-17.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Elderflower grant the clear sight of elder witches who have seen everything at least twice.

8-12-16.name: Elixir of Visionary Witchcraft
8-12-16.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Mugwort create prophetic visions specifically about magical workings—which will succeed, which will fail.

8-12-15.name: Potion of True Sight
8-12-15.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Wormwood grant sight that penetrates all illusions, glamours, and magical disguises.

8-12-14.name: Brew of Spirit Sight
8-12-14.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Graveyard Moss grant clear vision of spirits, ghosts, and entities normally invisible.

8-12-13.name: Tonic of Lucky Sight
8-12-13.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Black Cat Whisker grant the ability to see fortunate paths and lucky opportunities.

8-11-19.name: Essence of the Moon Witch
8-11-19.description: Witch Hazel, Wolfsbane, and Stardust connect to witches who work by moonlight. Their secrets become accessible to the drinker.

8-11-18.name: Philtre of the Wolf Witch
8-11-18.description: Witch Hazel, Wolfsbane, and Blood Rose Thorn. Some witches ally with wolves. This brew forges that fierce partnership.

8-11-17.name: Concoction of the Wild Witch
8-11-17.description: Witch Hazel, Wolfsbane, and Elderflower connect to witches who never lived in towns. Their wild magic becomes available.

8-11-16.name: Infusion of Wolfish Dreams
8-11-16.description: Witch Hazel, Wolfsbane, and Mugwort let the witch dream as wolves dream—of pack, hunt, and moonlit freedom.

8-11-15.name: Draft of the Lone Witch
8-11-15.description: Witch Hazel, Wolfsbane, and Wormwood. Some witches work alone by choice or necessity. This brew grants solitary strength.

8-11-14.name: Elixir of the Graveyard Wolf
8-11-14.description: Witch Hazel, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss connect to wolves buried with witch honor and the protective spirits they became.

8-11-13.name: Potion of the Lucky Hunt
8-11-13.description: Witch Hazel, Wolfsbane, and Black Cat Whisker grant lucky hunting whether the prey is food, knowledge, or magical ingredients.

8-11-12.name: Brew of Wolf Sight
8-11-12.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Wolfsbane grant wolf-like perception—awareness of pack dynamics, territorial boundaries, and hidden threats.

8-10-19.name: Tonic of the Garden Witch
8-10-19.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Stardust honor witches whose power flows through gardens. Their green magic becomes accessible.

8-10-18.name: Essence of the Thorned Garden
8-10-18.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Blood Rose Thorn. The witch's garden has teeth. This brew grants mastery of protective plants.

8-10-17.name: Philtre of the Hedge Garden
8-10-17.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Elderflower create the perfect hedge witch's brew. Power flows from garden to witch and back.

8-10-16.name: Concoction of Garden Dreams
8-10-16.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Mugwort let the witch dream their perfect garden into being. Sometimes seeds of dream-plants take root.

8-10-15.name: Infusion of Bitter Gardens
8-10-15.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Wormwood. Gardens require sacrifice—time, effort, sometimes blood. This brew teaches the true cost of cultivation.

8-10-14.name: Draft of Memorial Gardens
8-10-14.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Graveyard Moss. Gardens planted over graves draw power from the dead. This brew teaches ethical ways to work with that energy.

8-10-13.name: Elixir of the Lucky Garden
8-10-13.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Black Cat Whisker bless the garden with fortunate growth. Plants thrive, pests avoid, harvests multiply.

8-10-12.name: Potion of Garden Sight
8-10-12.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Foxglove grant the ability to see a plant's needs, ailments, and magical properties at a glance.

8-10-11.name: Brew of the Moon Garden
8-10-11.description: Witch Hazel, Foxglove, and Wolfsbane create a brew for tending night gardens where moon-blooming plants hold court.

8-9-19.name: Tonic of Witch and Beauty
8-9-19.description: Witch Hazel and Belladonna—craft and beauty merged. Stardust elevates both. For witches who would work magic through glamour.

8-9-18.name: Essence of Beautiful Witchcraft
8-9-18.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Blood Rose Thorn. Some magic is meant to be beautiful. This brew ensures workings please the eye while pleasing the spirit.

8-9-17.name: Philtre of the Beautiful Crone
8-9-17.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Elderflower. Age need not diminish beauty. This brew reveals the magnificence of witches who have lived long.

8-9-16.name: Concoction of Beautiful Dreams
8-9-16.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Mugwort create dreams of stunning beauty—both the dreamer and the dreamscape become gorgeous.

8-9-15.name: Infusion of True Beauty
8-9-15.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Wormwood strip away false beauty to reveal what genuinely shines beneath. Harsh but ultimately kind.

8-9-14.name: Draft of Eternal Beauty
8-9-14.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Graveyard Moss. Some beauty survives death. This brew reveals what of us remains beautiful forever.

8-9-13.name: Elixir of Lucky Beauty
8-9-13.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Black Cat Whisker grant fortunate beauty—looking your best exactly when it matters most.

8-9-12.name: Potion of Beauty Sight
8-9-12.description: Eye of Newt, Witch Hazel, and Belladonna grant the ability to see beauty in all things and reveal hidden loveliness to others.

8-9-11.name: Brew of Moonlit Beauty
8-9-11.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Wolfsbane grant beauty that intensifies under moonlight. For those who do their best work at night.

8-9-10.name: Tonic of the Beautiful Garden
8-9-10.description: Witch Hazel, Belladonna, and Foxglove ensure the witch's garden is not only powerful but beautiful. Aesthetics and magic aligned.

7-18-19.name: Essence of the Starlit Wing
7-18-19.description: Bat Wing carries the drinker through night skies while Stardust illuminates the path and Blood Rose Thorn ensures safe return. For astral travelers.

7-17-19.name: Philtre of the Elder Flight
7-17-19.description: Bat Wing, Elderflower, and Stardust grant flight between worlds. The oldest passages open to those who drink this ancient brew.

7-17-18.name: Concoction of Thorned Wings
7-17-18.description: Bat Wing, Elderflower, and Blood Rose Thorn. Flight has costs. This brew grants wings but reminds that every ascent requires sacrifice.

7-16-19.name: Infusion of Dream Flight
7-16-19.description: Bat Wing, Mugwort, and Stardust create dreams of soaring through star-filled skies. Some dreamers wake with memories of distant worlds.

7-16-18.name: Draft of Bleeding Wings
7-16-18.description: Bat Wing, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn create dreams of flight that cost. The dreamer soars but pays in phantom pain upon waking.

7-16-17.name: Elixir of the Dream Gate
7-16-17.description: Bat Wing, Mugwort, and Elderflower allow flight through dreams to other dreamers' minds. Visit sleeping allies or enemies.

7-15-19.name: Potion of Bitter Flight
7-15-19.description: Bat Wing, Wormwood, and Stardust grant flight that reveals harsh truths. See the world from above, stripped of comforting illusions.

7-15-18.name: Brew of Painful Soaring
7-15-18.description: Bat Wing, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn. Some must suffer to fly free. This brew is for those escaping painful circumstances.

7-15-17.name: Tonic of the Bitter Passage
7-15-17.description: Bat Wing, Wormwood, and Elderflower grant passage through unpleasant transitions. The journey is harsh but the destination is reached.

7-15-16.name: Essence of Harsh Dreams
7-15-16.description: Bat Wing, Wormwood, and Mugwort create flying dreams that teach difficult lessons. The dreamer soars through uncomfortable truths.

7-14-19.name: Philtre of the Crypt Flyer
7-14-19.description: Bat Wing, Graveyard Moss, and Stardust grant the ability to fly safely through haunted places where spirits congregate.

7-14-18.name: Concoction of Grave Wings
7-14-18.description: Bat Wing, Graveyard Moss, and Blood Rose Thorn. Bats roost in mausoleums. This brew grants communion with cemetery spirits.

7-14-17.name: Infusion of Death's Flight
7-14-17.description: Bat Wing, Graveyard Moss, and Elderflower grant safe passage over the lands of the dead. Fly above without being pulled below.

7-14-16.name: Draft of Grave Dreams
7-14-16.description: Bat Wing, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort create dreams of flying over endless cemeteries, seeing who rests where and why.

7-14-15.name: Elixir of Bitter Crypts
7-14-15.description: Bat Wing, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood reveal what truly happens in tombs. Not for the faint of heart or weak of stomach.

7-13-19.name: Potion of Lucky Flight
7-13-19.description: Bat Wing, Black Cat Whisker, and Stardust grant fortunate journeys. Travelers who drink this reach their destinations safely.

7-13-18.name: Brew of Fortunate Wings
7-13-18.description: Bat Wing, Black Cat Whisker, and Blood Rose Thorn ensure that risks taken in flight pay off. For those who must leap without looking.

7-13-17.name: Tonic of Lucky Passage
7-13-17.description: Bat Wing, Black Cat Whisker, and Elderflower bless all transitions with good fortune. Change becomes opportunity.

7-13-16.name: Essence of Lucky Dreams
7-13-16.description: Bat Wing, Black Cat Whisker, and Mugwort create flying dreams that reveal fortunate paths and lucky opportunities ahead.

7-13-15.name: Philtre of True Fortune
7-13-15.description: Bat Wing, Black Cat Whisker, and Wormwood reveal whether apparent luck is genuine or a trap beautifully baited.

7-13-14.name: Concoction of Cemetery Fortune
7-13-14.description: Bat Wing, Black Cat Whisker, and Graveyard Moss reveal which ancestors still send luck from beyond the grave.

7-12-19.name: Infusion of Seeing Flight
7-12-19.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Stardust grant aerial vision—see the world from above while your body remains grounded.

7-12-18.name: Draft of the Watchful Wing
7-12-18.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the ability to fly in spirit form and observe what happens in your absence.

7-12-17.name: Elixir of Far Sight
7-12-17.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Elderflower send the drinker's vision flying to distant places. See without being seen.

7-12-16.name: Potion of Visionary Flight
7-12-16.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Mugwort create prophetic dreams of flying over future landscapes, seeing what will come to pass.

7-12-15.name: Brew of Clear Flight
7-12-15.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Wormwood strip away clouds and confusion. See clearly from any height, in any weather.

7-12-14.name: Tonic of Spirit Flight
7-12-14.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Graveyard Moss allow the living to fly among spirits, observing the dead without disturbing them.

7-12-13.name: Essence of Fortunate Sight
7-12-13.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Black Cat Whisker reveal lucky paths visible only from above. Find shortcuts and safe passages.

7-11-19.name: Philtre of Night Hunters
7-11-19.description: Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Stardust unite two great night hunters. Grant their combined senses to track anything under stars.

7-11-18.name: Concoction of the Aerial Pack
7-11-18.description: Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Blood Rose Thorn forge bonds between hunters of air and ground. Coordinate pursuit perfectly.

7-11-17.name: Infusion of the Wild Night
7-11-17.description: Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Elderflower open passages to the wild hunt. Join the eternal chase across moonlit skies.

7-11-16.name: Draft of Hunting Dreams
7-11-16.description: Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Mugwort create dreams of the perfect hunt—soaring and running together until prey is caught.

7-11-15.name: Elixir of Bitter Hunters
7-11-15.description: Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Wormwood grant the determination to pursue unpleasant truths until they are caught and faced.

7-11-14.name: Potion of Graveyard Hunters
7-11-14.description: Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss track spirits who will not rest. Hunt the troublesome dead back to their graves.

7-11-13.name: Brew of Lucky Hunters
7-11-13.description: Bat Wing, Wolfsbane, and Black Cat Whisker ensure the hunt succeeds. Prey cannot escape such fortunate pursuit.

7-11-12.name: Tonic of Hunter's Sight
7-11-12.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Wolfsbane grant perfect predator vision. Nothing hides, nothing escapes notice.

7-10-19.name: Essence of the Night Garden
7-10-19.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Stardust reveal gardens as bats see them—alive with nocturnal visitors and moonlit blooms.

7-10-18.name: Philtre of Twilight Thorns
7-10-18.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Blood Rose Thorn. Gardens protect themselves at night. This brew recruits bats to guard thorny borders.

7-10-17.name: Concoction of the Evening Garden
7-10-17.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Elderflower. As twilight falls, the garden transforms. This brew reveals its nocturnal secrets.

7-10-16.name: Infusion of Garden Night Dreams
7-10-16.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Mugwort create dreams of flying through moonlit gardens where every flower is a tiny world.

7-10-15.name: Draft of Night's Truth
7-10-15.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Wormwood reveal what happens in gardens after dark—the battles, the growth, the secret life.

7-10-14.name: Elixir of the Cemetery Garden
7-10-14.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Graveyard Moss. Cemetery gardens grow differently. This brew reveals their unique magic.

7-10-13.name: Potion of Lucky Pollination
7-10-13.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Black Cat Whisker bless gardens with fortunate visits from night pollinators. Abundance follows.

7-10-12.name: Brew of Night Garden Sight
7-10-12.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Foxglove grant perfect vision in moonlit gardens. Every petal, every visitor, clearly seen.

7-10-11.name: Tonic of the Moon Garden Hunt
7-10-11.description: Bat Wing, Foxglove, and Wolfsbane. Night predators pass through night gardens. This brew grants awareness of their passage.

7-9-19.name: Essence of Dark Beauty
7-9-19.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Stardust grant the beauty of darkness—elegant, mysterious, impossible to look away from.

7-9-18.name: Philtre of Night's Allure
7-9-18.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Blood Rose Thorn grant seductive power that intensifies after sunset. For those who hunt hearts.

7-9-17.name: Concoction of Beautiful Passages
7-9-17.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Elderflower make all transitions beautiful. Even difficult changes become graceful flights.

7-9-16.name: Infusion of Beautiful Night Dreams
7-9-16.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Mugwort create dreams of flying through starlit skies, beautiful and free and utterly alone.

7-9-15.name: Draft of Honest Beauty
7-9-15.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Wormwood reveal beauty that survives harsh examination. What remains after truth is genuine.

7-9-14.name: Elixir of Eternal Flight
7-9-14.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Graveyard Moss. Some spirits continue to fly after death. This brew reveals their paths.

7-9-13.name: Potion of Beautiful Fortune
7-9-13.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Black Cat Whisker grant lucky beauty—looking your best exactly when opportunity arrives.

7-9-12.name: Brew of Seeing Beauty
7-9-12.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Belladonna grant the ability to see beauty in darkness and find loveliness in shadowed places.

7-9-11.name: Tonic of Beautiful Hunters
7-9-11.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Wolfsbane grant predatory grace—hunt with style, pursue with elegance, capture beautifully.

7-9-10.name: Essence of the Night Bloom
7-9-10.description: Bat Wing, Belladonna, and Foxglove celebrate flowers that bloom at night. Grant kinship with nocturnal gardens.

7-8-19.name: Philtre of the Flying Witch
7-8-19.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Stardust—the traditional flight brew. Witches have soared on this combination for centuries.

7-8-18.name: Concoction of the Witch's Journey
7-8-18.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Blood Rose Thorn. Every witch's path requires sacrifice. This brew grants wings worth the cost.

7-8-17.name: Infusion of the Flying Crone
7-8-17.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Elderflower honor old witches who still take to the sky. Their wisdom rides the wind.

7-8-16.name: Draft of the Witch's Dream Flight
7-8-16.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Mugwort create dreams where witches fly to sabbats. Sometimes they meet real covens there.

7-8-15.name: Elixir of Honest Flight
7-8-15.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Wormwood grant flight with clarity. See the world truly from above, no illusions soften the view.

7-8-14.name: Potion of the Graveyard Flight
7-8-14.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Graveyard Moss grant safe flight over burial grounds where other travelers might be pulled down.

7-8-13.name: Brew of the Lucky Witch's Flight
7-8-13.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Black Cat Whisker bless every journey with good fortune. The witch arrives safely wherever she wills.

7-8-12.name: Tonic of the Witch's Sight
7-8-12.description: Eye of Newt, Bat Wing, and Witch Hazel grant the classic witch's aerial vision. See magic from above, spot ley lines, find hidden places.

7-8-11.name: Essence of the Night Witch
7-8-11.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Wolfsbane connect to witches who work only in darkness. Their nocturnal magic becomes accessible.

7-8-10.name: Philtre of the Garden Witch's Flight
7-8-10.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Foxglove let garden witches survey their domains from above. See every plant, every need, every blessing.

7-8-9.name: Concoction of Beautiful Flight
7-8-9.description: Bat Wing, Witch Hazel, and Belladonna grant graceful, elegant flight. Soar beautifully, land perfectly, look magnificent throughout.

6-18-19.name: Infusion of the Cosmic Croak
6-18-19.description: Toad Tongue, Blood Rose Thorn, and Stardust. Ancient peoples believed toad songs called to stars. This brew reconnects that cosmic link.

6-17-19.name: Draft of the Elder Pond
6-17-19.description: Toad Tongue, Elderflower, and Stardust. The oldest toads remember when elder trees were young. This brew accesses primordial memory.

6-17-18.name: Elixir of Thorned Tongues
6-17-18.description: Toad Tongue, Elderflower, and Blood Rose Thorn grant speech that pierces denial and crosses thresholds. Words that cannot be ignored.

6-16-19.name: Potion of Starlit Croaking
6-16-19.description: Toad Tongue, Mugwort, and Stardust create prophetic croaking—speak truth without knowing it, predict without intention.

6-16-18.name: Brew of Painful Truths
6-16-18.description: Toad Tongue, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn force words that hurt to say but must be spoken. Prophetic speech that costs.

6-16-17.name: Tonic of Dream Speech
6-16-17.description: Toad Tongue, Mugwort, and Elderflower grant the ability to speak in dreams—yours or others'. Words cross the threshold of sleep.

6-15-19.name: Essence of Bitter Croaking
6-15-19.description: Toad Tongue, Wormwood, and Stardust grant speech stripped of flattery. Words become harsh, true, and impossible to mishear.

6-15-18.name: Philtre of Painful Words
6-15-18.description: Toad Tongue, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn. Some truths hurt to speak and to hear. This brew forces both parties through.

6-15-17.name: Concoction of Bitter Passage
6-15-17.description: Toad Tongue, Wormwood, and Elderflower speak words that open difficult doors. Cross thresholds others fear to approach.

6-15-16.name: Infusion of Harsh Dreams
6-15-16.description: Toad Tongue, Wormwood, and Mugwort create dreams where difficult truths are spoken aloud. Wake knowing what must be said.

6-14-19.name: Draft of Speaking with Stars and Dead
6-14-19.description: Toad Tongue, Graveyard Moss, and Stardust grant speech that reaches both the buried and the celestial. Mediate between earth and sky.

6-14-18.name: Elixir of Grave Tongues
6-14-18.description: Toad Tongue, Graveyard Moss, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the ability to speak with those who died violently. Their urgent messages come through.

6-14-17.name: Potion of Speaking Past Death
6-14-17.description: Toad Tongue, Graveyard Moss, and Elderflower grant speech that crosses death's threshold. Conversation with the departed becomes possible.

6-14-16.name: Brew of Dead Man's Dreams
6-14-16.description: Toad Tongue, Graveyard Moss, and Mugwort let the drinker hear what the dead dream of saying. Receive messages meant for the living.

6-14-15.name: Tonic of Grave Truths
6-14-15.description: Toad Tongue, Graveyard Moss, and Wormwood force the dead to speak plainly. No riddles, no metaphors, only harsh truth.

6-13-19.name: Essence of Lucky Words
6-13-19.description: Toad Tongue, Black Cat Whisker, and Stardust grant fortunate speech. Say the right thing at the right time by blessed chance.

6-13-18.name: Philtre of Fortunate Pain
6-13-18.description: Toad Tongue, Black Cat Whisker, and Blood Rose Thorn ensure that painful truths spoken lead to lucky outcomes.

6-13-17.name: Concoction of Lucky Passage
6-13-17.description: Toad Tongue, Black Cat Whisker, and Elderflower grant fortunate words for crossing thresholds. Speak the passwords luck provides.

6-13-16.name: Infusion of Lucky Prophecy
6-13-16.description: Toad Tongue, Black Cat Whisker, and Mugwort grant prophetic speech that only predicts good fortune. Sometimes that's enough.

6-13-15.name: Draft of Honest Luck
6-13-15.description: Toad Tongue, Black Cat Whisker, and Wormwood ensure lucky words are also true words. Fortune without falsehood.

6-13-14.name: Elixir of Cemetery Luck
6-13-14.description: Toad Tongue, Black Cat Whisker, and Graveyard Moss grant fortunate communication with ancestor spirits. They share winning secrets.

6-12-19.name: Potion of Seeing and Speaking Stars
6-12-19.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Stardust grant cosmic perception and the words to express it. Describe the indescribable.

6-12-18.name: Brew of Witnessing Pain
6-12-18.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the ability to see suffering and speak it into healing.

6-12-17.name: Tonic of Threshold Speech
6-12-17.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Elderflower grant vision of doorways and words to open them. No passage remains closed.

6-12-16.name: Essence of Prophetic Sight and Speech
6-12-16.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Mugwort grant complete prophetic ability—see futures and speak them clearly.

6-12-15.name: Philtre of Clear Truth
6-12-15.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Wormwood grant perfect clarity. See truth, speak truth, accept no substitutes.

6-12-14.name: Concoction of Spirit Speech
6-12-14.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Graveyard Moss grant the ability to see spirits and speak with them naturally.

6-12-13.name: Infusion of Fortunate Communication
6-12-13.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Black Cat Whisker grant lucky insight into what others need to hear. Speak blessings.

6-11-19.name: Draft of Wolf and Toad Song
6-11-19.description: Toad Tongue, Wolfsbane, and Stardust unite the chorus of night—croaking ponds and howling hills beneath stars.

6-11-18.name: Elixir of Predator Speech
6-11-18.description: Toad Tongue, Wolfsbane, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the commanding voice of apex predators. Speak and be obeyed.

6-11-17.name: Potion of the Wild Voice
6-11-17.description: Toad Tongue, Wolfsbane, and Elderflower grant speech that wild things understand. Communicate across species boundaries.

6-11-16.name: Brew of Howling Dreams
6-11-16.description: Toad Tongue, Wolfsbane, and Mugwort create dreams where the dreamer runs with wolves while understanding their speech.

6-11-15.name: Tonic of Harsh Pack Speech
6-11-15.description: Toad Tongue, Wolfsbane, and Wormwood grant the harsh honesty of pack dynamics. No politics, only truth of rank and role.

6-11-14.name: Essence of Ancestor Wolves
6-11-14.description: Toad Tongue, Wolfsbane, and Graveyard Moss grant communication with the spirits of wolves long dead. Old pack wisdom speaks.

6-11-13.name: Philtre of Lucky Hunting Speech
6-11-13.description: Toad Tongue, Wolfsbane, and Black Cat Whisker grant the calls that summon lucky prey. Hunting parties never return empty.

6-11-12.name: Concoction of Pack Sight
6-11-12.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Wolfsbane grant the shared awareness of a hunting pack. See through many eyes, speak as one voice.

6-10-19.name: Infusion of Garden Gossip
6-10-19.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Stardust grant the ability to hear what gardens whisper to the stars. Plant secrets revealed.

6-10-18.name: Draft of the Garden's Pain
6-10-18.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Blood Rose Thorn grant hearing of garden suffering. Know which plants need help and why.

6-10-17.name: Elixir of the Speaking Garden
6-10-17.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Elderflower grant full communication with garden plants. Ask questions, receive answers.

6-10-16.name: Potion of Garden Dreams
6-10-16.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Mugwort create dreams where the garden speaks freely of its needs, hopes, and fears.

6-10-15.name: Brew of Garden Truth
6-10-15.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Wormwood force gardens to reveal their true state—no hiding disease, no concealing needs.

6-10-14.name: Tonic of Cemetery Garden Speech
6-10-14.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Graveyard Moss grant communication with plants growing over graves. They share what the dead feel.

6-10-13.name: Essence of Lucky Gardens
6-10-13.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Black Cat Whisker grant speech that blesses gardens. Speak growth, speak abundance, speak thriving.

6-10-12.name: Philtre of Garden Vision
6-10-12.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Foxglove grant complete garden awareness. See and speak with every plant, every visitor, every spirit.

6-10-11.name: Concoction of Night Garden Speech
6-10-11.description: Toad Tongue, Foxglove, and Wolfsbane grant communication with gardens after dark, when different spirits walk among the beds.

6-9-19.name: Infusion of Beautiful Words
6-9-19.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Stardust grant speech of terrible beauty. Words so gorgeous they wound.

6-9-18.name: Draft of Seductive Truth
6-9-18.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Blood Rose Thorn grant the ability to speak hard truths beautifully. Pain delivered with grace.

6-9-17.name: Elixir of Beautiful Passage
6-9-17.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Elderflower grant words that make all transitions elegant. Cross thresholds with style.

6-9-16.name: Potion of Beautiful Dreams Spoken
6-9-16.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Mugwort grant the ability to speak dreams into being—but only beautiful dreams survive the speaking.

6-9-15.name: Brew of Honest Beauty
6-9-15.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Wormwood force beautiful truth from unwilling lips. Confessions become poetry.

6-9-14.name: Tonic of Eternal Words
6-9-14.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Graveyard Moss grant speech that reaches beautiful spirits. The graceful dead respond.

6-9-13.name: Essence of Charming Fortune
6-9-13.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Black Cat Whisker grant words that charm luck into staying. Speak fortune into solidity.

6-9-12.name: Philtre of Seeing and Speaking Beauty
6-9-12.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Belladonna grant the ability to see beauty and praise it perfectly. Nothing lovely goes unnoticed.

6-9-11.name: Concoction of Deadly Whispers
6-9-11.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Wolfsbane grant words with the power to wound like poison. Speak sparingly.

6-9-10.name: Infusion of Garden Flattery
6-9-10.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Foxglove grant speech that makes gardens feel beautiful. Praised plants grow better.

6-9-8.name: Draft of the Witch's Charm
6-9-8.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Witch Hazel grant the persuasive powers of witches legendary for getting their way. Speak and be believed.

6-9-7.name: Elixir of Night Speech
6-9-7.description: Toad Tongue, Belladonna, and Bat Wing grant beautiful speech that carries through darkness. Whisper and be heard across great distances.

6-8-19.name: Potion of the Witch's Star Song
6-8-19.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Stardust grant the voice of witches who sing to stars. Cosmic powers attend your words.

6-8-18.name: Brew of the Witch's Price
6-8-18.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Blood Rose Thorn grant words that seal magical bargains. Speak contracts that cannot be broken.

6-8-17.name: Tonic of Coven Speech
6-8-17.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Elderflower grant the secret language of covens. Speak to sister witches across any distance.

6-8-16.name: Essence of Dream Incantation
6-8-16.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Mugwort grant the ability to cast spells in dreams. Wake to find the magic begun.

6-8-15.name: Philtre of True Incantation
6-8-15.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Wormwood strip falsehood from spells. Only workings of genuine intent succeed.

6-8-14.name: Concoction of Necromantic Speech
6-8-14.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Graveyard Moss grant the witch's power to command spirits. Speak and the dead obey.

6-8-13.name: Infusion of Lucky Spellcasting
6-8-13.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Black Cat Whisker grant fortunate incantations. Spells succeed beyond expectation.

6-8-12.name: Draft of Spell Sight
6-8-12.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Witch Hazel grant the ability to see magic as it's spoken. Watch spells take shape in the air.

6-8-11.name: Elixir of Wolf-Tongue
6-8-11.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Wolfsbane grant command over wolves. Speak and the pack listens.

6-8-10.name: Potion of Garden Command
6-8-10.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Foxglove grant the witch's authority over gardens. Speak growth, speak bloom, speak yield.

6-8-9.name: Brew of Enchanting Speech
6-8-9.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Belladonna grant dangerously beautiful incantations. Spells that seduce as they work.

6-8-7.name: Tonic of Flying Words
6-8-7.description: Toad Tongue, Witch Hazel, and Bat Wing grant speech that travels. Send messages on wings through the night.

6-7-19.name: Essence of the Singing Stars
6-7-19.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Stardust grant the ability to hear the music of spheres and join the cosmic chorus.

6-7-18.name: Philtre of Winged Words
6-7-18.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Blood Rose Thorn grant speech that flies true despite pain. Say what hurts; let it soar.

6-7-17.name: Concoction of Messages Between Worlds
6-7-17.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Elderflower carry messages across thresholds. Speak to those in other realms.

6-7-16.name: Infusion of Dream Messages
6-7-16.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Mugwort send words into others' dreams. Communication that transcends waking barriers.

6-7-15.name: Draft of Bitter News
6-7-15.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Wormwood carry harsh messages that must be delivered. The messenger is protected.

6-7-14.name: Elixir of Speaking to the Dead
6-7-14.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Graveyard Moss send words to spirits wherever they roam. Messages reach the departed.

6-7-13.name: Potion of Lucky Messages
6-7-13.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Black Cat Whisker ensure messages arrive at fortunate moments. Perfect timing, always.

6-7-12.name: Brew of Seen and Spoken
6-7-12.description: Eye of Newt, Toad Tongue, and Bat Wing grant the ability to describe exactly what you see. Perfect witness testimony.

6-7-11.name: Tonic of Pack Calls
6-7-11.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Wolfsbane grant commanding howls that summon allies from great distances.

6-7-10.name: Essence of Garden Calls
6-7-10.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Foxglove grant the ability to call beneficial creatures to your garden from afar.

6-7-9.name: Philtre of Seductive Whispers
6-7-9.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Belladonna grant whispers that travel through darkness and entrance those who hear.

6-7-8.name: Concoction of Witch's Messengers
6-7-8.description: Toad Tongue, Bat Wing, and Witch Hazel create magical message carriers. Words take wing and find their targets.

5-18-19.name: Infusion of the Deadly Star
5-18-19.description: Nightshade Berry, Blood Rose Thorn, and Stardust combine fatal beauty with cosmic fire. A potion for those who would burn gloriously.

5-17-19.name: Draft of the Poisoned Threshold
5-17-19.description: Nightshade Berry, Elderflower, and Stardust guard passages with deadly beauty. Only the worthy survive crossing.

5-17-18.name: Elixir of Thorned Shadows
5-17-18.description: Nightshade Berry, Elderflower, and Blood Rose Thorn create passages through pain and poison. The door opens only to the suffering.

5-16-19.name: Potion of Poisoned Stars
5-16-19.description: Nightshade Berry, Mugwort, and Stardust create visions of cosmic poison—beautiful, deadly, and transformative.

5-16-18.name: Brew of Deadly Dreams
5-16-18.description: Nightshade Berry, Mugwort, and Blood Rose Thorn create nightmares that could kill. Survivors wake stronger.

5-16-17.name: Tonic of Fatal Visions
5-16-17.description: Nightshade Berry, Mugwort, and Elderflower grant visions of how passages end—in life or death.

5-15-19.name: Essence of Bitter Poison
5-15-19.description: Nightshade Berry, Wormwood, and Stardust combine two bitter truths with cosmic perspective. Survive this and fear nothing.

5-15-18.name: Philtre of Double Pain
5-15-18.description: Nightshade Berry, Wormwood, and Blood Rose Thorn. Pain upon pain that purifies. Only the determined drink twice.

5-15-17.name: Concoction of Harsh Passage
